Title: "Too Good" Fruit Dip

Title: Sloppy Joes

Title: Lemon Congealed Salad
Ingredients: ["1 large box lemon jello", "1 large can crushed pineapple (can use chunks)", "1 large container Cool Whip", "8 oz. cream cheese", "1 c. powdered sugar", "3/4 c. sugar", "4 Tbsp. flour", "2 eggs, beaten"]
Recipe: ["Drain juice from pineapple and save.", "Prepare lemon jello as directed and pour into a 9 x 13-inch Pyrex dish.", "Allow to jell a little.", "Add pineapple to jello and stir well.", "Let it jell completely.", "Mix 1 cup pineapple juice, flour and beaten eggs in saucepan over low heat for 10 minutes.", "Cool.", "Spoon over jello layer.", "Then spoon whipped topping over this layer.", "Sprinkle with nuts.", "Put back into refrigerator."]

Title: Parmesan Vegetable Toss
Ingredients: ["2 c. mayonnaise", "1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese", "1/4 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. dried basil", "1/2 tsp. salt", "4 c. fresh broccoli florets", "4 c. fresh cauliflowerets", "1 medium red onion, sliced", "1 (8 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts, drained", "1 large head iceberg lettuce, torn", "1 lb. sliced bacon, cooked and crumbled", "2 c. croutons"]
Recipe: ["In a large bowl, combine mayonnaise, Parmesan cheese, sugar, basil and salt.", "Add broccoli, cauliflower, onion and water chestnuts; toss.", "Cover and refrigerate for several hours or overnight."]

Title: Holiday Fruit Drops

Recipe: ["Sift together into bowl and reserve flour, soda and salt. Cream butter, sugar and eggs.", "Add buttermilk, vanilla and flour mixture, mixing well.", "Stir in chopped nuts, candied cherries and pitted dates.", "Drop by teaspoon on lightly greased cookie sheet. Top each with a nut half if desired."]

Title: Date Nut Balls
Ingredients: ["1 c. white sugar", "1 pkg. chopped sugared dates", "1 stick butter", "1 c. chopped pecans", "2 c. Rice Krispies", "2 tsp. vanilla", "powdered sugar"]
Recipe: ["Place sugar, dates and butter in a double boiler.", "Cook slow for approximately 10 minutes until sticky.", "Remove from heat.", "Add pecans, Rice Krispies and vanilla.", "Let cool.", "Fill 1 teaspoon full, roll in a ball and roll in powdered sugar."]

Title: Chicken-Broccoli-Rice Casserole
Ingredients: ["1 (10 oz.) bag chopped broccoli", "4 chicken breasts, boiled and cut into bite-size pieces", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "1 stick butter", "1 onion, diced", "1 small jar Cheez Whiz", "1/2 c. celery, diced", "1 small jar pimiento, drained", "2 c. cooked rice (1 c. uncooked rice)"]
Recipe: ["Saute onion and celery in butter.", "In large casserole dish, mix Cheez Whiz and cream of mushroom soup.", "Add butter, celery and onion while warm.", "Mix in rice, broccoli and chicken.", "Sprinkle pimiento on top.", "Cover and bake 30 to 40 minutes or until golden in color.", "Serves 4 to 6."]

Title: Five Star Broccoli Salad
Ingredients: ["1 bunch broccoli, chopped", "1 medium purple onion, chopped", "8 to 12 strips bacon, cook crisp and crumble when cool and set aside", "1/4 to 1/2 c. sunflower seeds", "1/2 to 1 c. raisins", "1/2 c. mayonnaise", "1/4 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. or to taste wine vinegar"]
Recipe: ["Mix broccoli and onion together and set aside in refrigerator. Mix mayonnaise, sugar and vinegar together and set aside.", "One hour before serving, stir in bacon, sunflower seeds and raisins. Then add mayonnaise mixture, mixing well.", "Refrigerate.", "Right before serving, stir in 1 cup grated mild or medium Cheddar cheese.", "This is an excellent salad and very colorful."]

Title: Italian Pasta-Bean Soup Mix
Ingredients: ["1/2 c. each dried pinto beans, pink beans and kidney beans", "1 c. small pasta bows (4 oz.)", "1 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper", "1 Tbsp. instant chicken broth granules", "2 tsp. dried rosemary leaves", "2 Tbsp. dried parsley flakes", "1 tsp. dried basil leaves", "1/2 tsp. instant minced garlic"]
Recipe: ["If Packaged for Gift:", "Put beans into a 3 to 3 1/2-cup jar with tight fitting lid.", "Put pasta in a sandwich size plastic bag and place on top of beans. Put remaining ingredients into sandwich bag or make a pouch using cheesecloth, plastic wrap or fine netting. Close tightly or tie with a ribbon. Put packet in with beans and pasta or tie to jar.", "Be sure to include the following cooking directions."]

Title: Cocoa Syrup
Ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. hot water", "1 c. cocoa", "1 c. cold water", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
Recipe: ["Combine cocoa, sugar and salt in saucepan.", "Mix well and stir in cold water to make a smooth paste.", "Blend in hot water and vanilla.", "Simmer 4 to 5 minutes, stirring until thick and smooth. If more rich syrup is wanted, use 1 cup hot milk for hot water. Store and use as you would any other chocolate syrup."]

Title: Shane'S Chili Recipe
Ingredients: ["1-1/2 lb hamburger", "1 lg can pork and beans", "1-1/2 tsp chili powder", "2 or 3 dashes worcestershire sauce", "16 oz ketchup", "1 can stewed tomatoes", "1 med onion chopped (optional)"]
Recipe: ["Brown hamburger.", "Add remaining ingredients, let simmer a little then eat.", "Can substitute ground venison for hamburger."]

Title: S & W Rigatoni Fagioli
Ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. olive oil", "2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch chunks", "1/2 medium onion, chopped", "2 to 3 garlic cloves, minced", "1 (14 1/2 oz.) can S & W ready-cut tomatoes, undrained", "1/4 c. chopped fresh basil leaves", "8 oz. dry rigatoni, cooked and drained", "1 (15 oz.) can S & W white beans, drained", "salt and pepper", "Parmesan cheese"]
Recipe: ["Heat olive oil in a large skillet.", "Saute chicken, stirring frequently, until cooked. Add onion and garlic.", "Saute 2 to 3 minutes.", "Stir in S & W ready-cut tomatoes and basil. Season with salt and pepper.", "Remove from heat.", "Garnish with Parmesan cheese.", "Serves 3 to 4."]

Title: Summer Pasta With Sauce
Ingredients: ["tubular pasta", "diced tomatoes", "shredded Parmesan", "basil", "olive oil", "pinch of red pepper flakes"]
Recipe: ["Toss with hot pasta.", "If desired, cilantro, artichoke hearts, mushrooms or other vegetables may be added."]

Title: Smooth 'N Melty Pie
Ingredients: ["8 oz. cream cheese (soft)", "8 oz. Smooth 'N Melty mints, melted (Mary of Puddin Hill)", "2/3 c. powdered sugar", "3 Tbsp. half and half or milk", "1 small container Cool Whip", "1 graham cracker or Oreo crust"]
Recipe: ["Blend cream cheese, mints and sugar until smooth.", "Add half and half, beating until fluffy.", "Fold in Cool Whip.", "Pour into crust and chill well."]

Title: Rose'S Hot Chicken
Ingredients: ["3 Tbsp. soy sauce", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "2 large chicken breasts, boned, skinned and cut into 1/2-inch cubes", "1 Tbsp. sherry", "2 tsp. sugar", "1 tsp. white vinegar", "1/4 c. Planters peanut oil", "1 tsp. crushed red pepper", "1/3 c. sliced scallions", "1/2 tsp. ground ginger"]
Recipe: ["Blend 1 tablespoon soy sauce and cornstarch in a bowl; mix in chicken and set aside.", "Combine remaining 2 tablespoons soy sauce sherry, sugar and white vinegar; set aside.", "Heat Planters peanut oil in wok or large skillet over high heat.", "Add red pepper, cook until pepper turns black; add chicken and stir-fry 2 minutes. Remove and set aside.", "Stir-fry scallions and ginger for 1 minute. Return chicken to wok and cook 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Add soy mixture; cook 1 minute longer, stirring constantly.", "Serve over hot rice (use Uncle Ben's converted rice)."]

Title: Slow Cooked Pepper Steak
Ingredients: ["2 lb. round steak", "1/4 c. soy sauce", "1 c. chopped onion", "1 garlic clove, minced", "1 tsp. sugar", "1 (16 oz.) can stewed tomatoes with liquid", "2 green peppers, cut into strips", "salt and pepper to taste", "1/2 c. cold water", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "cooked noodles or rice"]
Recipe: ["Cut beef into 3 x 1-inch strips.", "Place in crock-pot.", "Combine the next 4 ingredients and pour over beef.", "Cover and cook on low 5 to 6 hours.", "Add tomatoes and green peppers; cook on low for 1 hour longer.", "Combine the cold water and cornstarch to make a paste.", "Stir into liquid in slow cooker and cook on high until thickened.", "Serve over noodles or rice."]

Title: Cranberry Salad Deluxe

Title: Buckeyes

Title: Orange Balls

Recipe: ["Cream butter, sugar and orange juice together.", "Add remaining ingredients.", "Shape into balls and dip in powdered sugar or coconut.", "Makes 36 balls."]

Title: Chicken Paprikas
Ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. shortening", "1/2 c. chopped onions", "3 lb. broiler-fryer chicken, disjointed", "2 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. paprika", "1 c. water", "2 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. sour cream"]
Recipe: ["Melt shortening in deep heavy skillet or Dutch oven.", "Add onions and saute until golden.", "Remove from pan.", "Add chicken pieces, browning lightly.", "Sprinkle with seasonings and return onions to pan.", "Add water, cover and simmer until tender, about 1 hour.", "Remove chicken and keep warm.", "Pour off about half of the drippings.", "Stir flour into sour cream.", "Add to drippings in pan, simmer gently until thoroughly heated.", "But do not boil. Title: Chess Squares

Title: Basic Biscuits
Ingredients: ["1 pkg. yeast", "1/2 cup lukewarm water", "5 c. all-purpose flour", "1 tsp. baking soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. baking powder", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "3/4 c. Crisco shortening", "2 c. buttermilk"]

Title: Fluffy 2 Step Easter Cheesecake

Title: Old Fashioned Ice Cream

Title: Orange Sherbet

Title: Sweet Pickles

Recipe: ["Cut and drain pickles very good.", "Put, in a large container, 1 layer of pickles and then sugar, until finished.", "Place bag of spice in between.", "Stir twice a day for 3 days.", "Put into jars."]

Title: Chicken Delight
Ingredients: ["3 cups rice", "3 cups hot water", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "6 chicken breasts", "1 pkg. onion soup mix"]
Recipe: ["Place rice, hot water and", "mushroom soup in a 9x13 pan, stir. Layer chicken breast on top of mixture. Sprinkle onion soup mix over chicken. Cover with foil and bake at 350 degrees for 1 1/2 hours."]

Title: Breakfast Bake
Ingredients: ["1 lb. Jimmy Dean sausage", "5 eggs", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. dry mustard", "6 slices white bread", "1 1/2 c. Longhorn Cheddar cheese", "2 c. half and half"]
Recipe: ["Crumble sausage in skillet.", "Cook until brown, stirring occasionally.", "Drain.", "Grease a 13 x 9-inch Pyrex dish.", "Line bottom with bread that has been cubed.", "Top with cooked sausage and grated cheese."]

Title: Beef And Broccoli Stir-Fry
Ingredients: ["8 oz. flank steak, trimmed", "1 clove garlic, finely chopped", "1 Tbsp. grated fresh ginger", "1 Tbsp. soy sauce", "1 lb. broccoli", "1 Tbsp. vegetable oil", "1 medium-size onion, sliced", "1/4 c. beef broth"]
Recipe: ["Slice steak diagonally into 1/4-inch thick strips.", "Place in bowl with garlic, ginger and soy sauce.", "Refrigerate, covered, 20 minutes.", "Cut broccoli flowerets.", "Peel stem and slice 1/4-inch thick.", "Heat 1 1/2 teaspoons of oil in large saucepan.", "Add beef and marinade.", "Stir-fry until brown 2 to 3 minutes.", "Remove from pan and set aside.", "Swirl remaining oil around pan.", "Add beef broth and onion.", "Stir-fry for 6 to 8 minutes.", "Add beef broth as needed to prevent sticking.", "Stir in meat; heat through.", "Makes 4 servings."]

Title: Cherry Cheese Pie
Ingredients: ["3 oz. cream cheese, softened", "1/2 c. powdered sugar, sifted", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "pinch of salt", "1/2 pt. whipping cream, whipped", "1 graham cracker or vanilla wafer crust", "1 can cherry pie filling"]
Recipe: ["Cream together the cream cheese, sugar, vanilla and salt. Fold whipped cream into mixture.", "Pour into pie shell.", "Cover with pie filling and chill.", "Makes 1 pie."]

Title: Sauerkraut Salad
Ingredients: ["1 (1 lb.) can sauerkraut", "1/2 c. cucumber (sliced thin)", "1/2 c. celery, chopped", "1/2 c. carrot, shredded", "1/4 c. onion, chopped", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "1/4 c. sugar", "salt and pepper"]
Recipe: ["Drain sauerkraut and cut into short pieces.", "Add remaining ingredients and mix well.", "Cover and chill for 8 hours or overnight."]

Title: Freezer Pickles
Ingredients: ["7 c. sliced cucumbers", "1 c. sliced onion", "1 Tbsp. salt", "1 c. vinegar", "1 tsp. celery seed", "2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. mustard seed"]
Recipe: ["Let cucumbers, onion and salt stand for 2 hours, then drain well.", "Combine remaining ingredients; bring to a boil for 1 minute, then let it cool.", "Add to cucumbers and onion.", "Let set in refrigerator for 2 to 3 days.", "Put into containers and freeze. Can also be kept in refrigerator."]

Title: Heath Bar Coffee Cake
Ingredients: ["1/4 lb. margarine, softened", "2 c. flour", "1 c. brown sugar", "1/2 c. white sugar", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "1 egg", "1 tsp. vanilla", "5 Heath bars, crumbled or 1 pkg. Heath chips", "1/4 c. chopped pecans"]
Recipe: ["Mix margarine, flour and sugar until crumbly.", "Take out 1/2 cup of mixture.", "Add Heath bars and pecans to 1/2 cup mixture and set aside."]

Title: Ribbon Salad(Nice For Holidays)
Ingredients: ["5 (3 oz.) pkg. jello (regular or sugar-free)", "1 1/4 c. boiling water (for each pkg. jello)", "sour cream"]
Recipe: ["Mix 1 1/4 cups water with one package jello.", "Pour 3/4 cup jello mixture in 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Let set.", "Add 3 tablespoons sour cream in remainder.", "Spread over the set jello.", "Continue with remainder of 4 flavors."]

Title: No Bake Chocolate-Peanut Butter Balls
Ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "3/4 c. margarine", "1/2 c. milk", "3/4 c. peanut butter", "4 Tbsp. cocoa", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "3 1/2 c. oatmeal"]
Recipe: ["Mix sugar, margarine and milk and boil for 1 minute exactly, stirring constantly, then take off stove. Add remaining ingredients. When mixed together, spoon onto cookie sheet and place in refrigerator until hard."]

Title: Hoppin' John
Ingredients: ["1 c. black-eyed peas", "3 1/2 c. water", "1/4 lb. bacon, sliced", "1 onion, sliced", "1/4 tsp. crushed hot pepper", "1/2 c. uncooked rice", "1 c. stewed tomatoes", "1/2 large green pepper, coarsely chopped", "1 tsp. salt", "black pepper to taste"]
Recipe: ["Heat peas and water to boiling in a medium saucepan.", "Cover and remove from heat.", "Let stand for 1 hour.", "Fry bacon; drain. Add with onion and hot pepper to peas.", "Cover and simmer until peas are tender, 1 to 1 1/2 hours; stir in rice, salt, black pepper, tomatoes and green pepper.", "Cover and simmer, stirring occasionally until rice is tender, about 25 minutes.", "Add additional water, if necessary."]

Title: Beef Stroganoff
Ingredients: ["2 lb. steak, sliced", "1 small onion", "1 c. ketchup", "1 c. sour cream", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "4 dashes of Worcestershire sauce", "3 Tbsp. butter", "egg noodles"]
Recipe: ["Saute onions in butter.", "Add meat; brown.", "Add other ingredients.", "Simmer covered 20 minutes.", "Cook noodles.", "Drain. Serve beef over noodles."]

Title: Sour Cream Pineapple Pudding
Ingredients: ["2 (3 oz.) pkg. instant vanilla pudding", "3 c. milk", "1 (8 oz.) container sour cream", "1 (9 oz.) Cool Whip", "1 large can chunk pineapple", "1 box vanilla wafers"]
Recipe: ["Combine pudding and milk.", "Mix thoroughly.", "Add sour cream and Cool Whip; mix well.", "Layer with pineapple and wafers."]

Title: Cheese Cake
Ingredients: ["1 lb. cream cheese, room temperature (for easier mixing)", "1 pt. sour cream", "1 c. sugar", "2 tsp. lemon extract", "2 Tbsp. flour", "5 eggs, separated", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1/4 lb. butter for crust, softened", "1/3 pkg. graham cracker crumbs"]
Recipe: ["Mix", "together cheese, sour cream, sugar, lemon extract, egg yolks,", "flour", "and", "2 tablespoons butter in a large mixing bowl. Beat egg whites stiff and fold in last."]

Title: Tasty Lamb Shanks
Ingredients: ["6 lamb shanks", "2 tsp. seasoned salt", "1 Tbsp. shortening", "1 (10 1/2 oz.) can condensed tomato soup", "1/2 can water", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. soy sauce", "2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/2 c. water", "fluffy, hot rice"]
Recipe: ["Wipe shanks with damp paper towel.", "Remove excess fat. Sprinkle with salt.", "Brown meat in hot fat in a heavy skillet or Dutch oven.", "Combine remaining ingredients except flour and water. Pour over browned shanks.", "Cover snugly and cook over low heat for 1 1/2 hours or until tender.", "Skim off fat.", "Combine flour and water; add to sauce and shanks.", "Cook until sauce is slightly thickened.", "Serve with rice.", "Serves 6."]

Title: Sue'S One Pan Meal
Ingredients: ["1 lb. ground beef", "1 large onion", "1 large bell pepper", "4 to 5 fresh tomatoes", "4 to 5 potatoes", "1/4 c. uncooked rice", "chili powder, salt, pepper to taste"]
Recipe: ["Brown beef and onion until brown.", "Drain.", "Mix chili powder, salt and pepper to meat.", "Set aside."]

Title: Harvest Time Apple Squares
Ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "1 c. packed brown sugar", "3/4 c. sugar", "1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon", "1/2 c. Parkay spread", "1 c. chopped walnuts", "1 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. milk", "1 egg, beaten", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "3 1/2 c. chopped apples"]
Recipe: ["Combine flour, brown sugar, 1/2 cup sugar and cinnamon; cut in spread until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.", "Stir in walnuts. Reserve 2 cup crumb mixture; press remaining mixture onto bottom of a 9 x 13-inch pan."]

Title: Sandwich Spread
Ingredients: ["1/2 lb. Velveeta cheese, softened with fork", "2 Tbsp. salad dressing", "8 or 9 chopped, stuffed olives or pickles", "3 hard-cooked eggs, chopped fine", "1/2 small onion, chopped"]
Recipe: ["Blend together and store in pint jar.", "Can add 2 tablespoons butter."]

Title: Seafood Salad
Ingredients: ["1/2 small box macaroni", "1 pkg. seafood sticks", "2 lb. shrimp, steamed", "Old Bay seasoning", "sprinkle of sugar", "1/2 c. celery", "1/2 c. onions", "mayonnaise", "2 boiled eggs"]
Recipe: ["Boil your macaroni.", "In a large bowl, add the macaroni. Sprinkle a little sugar on it and stir.", "Cut up your celery and onions very fine (add to bowl and stir)."]

Title: Peanut Clusters
Ingredients: ["1 lb. almond bark", "1 (12 oz.) pkg. chocolate chips", "1 sq. unsweetened chocolate", "1 lb. Spanish peanuts"]
Recipe: ["Melt the first 3 ingredients in a double boiler.", "When smooth, add the peanuts.", "Drop by teaspoonfuls on aluminum foil.", "Cool."]

Title: Smoked Venison
Ingredients: ["large portion deer meat (we use a whole ham, the size will depend on the size of your smoker)", "1 (2 liter) bottle Coca-Cola", "1/4 to 1/2 c. corn oil", "Tony Chachere's seasoning", "hickory or pecan chunks (smoke flavor)"]
Recipe: ["Cut meat to fit smoker rack.", "Rinse, drain and dry meat with a towel.", "Be sure it is dry.", "Rub meat with oil, then liberally apply seasoning.", "Place meat on rack over water pan which has been filled with equal parts Coke and water.", "Cook approximately 8 to 10 hours.", "When done, bone is easily removed from meat.", "Slice and serve with your favorite barbecue sauce."]

Title: Green Banana Salad
Ingredients: ["6 green bananas", "2 scallions", "mayonnaise dressing", "salt and pepper to taste", "2 cloves garlic"]
Recipe: ["Boil green bananas until they are easy to peel.", "Remove peel; cut into cubes.", "Roast cloves of garlic and chop into pieces.", "Add to bananas.", "Chop scallions, using only the leaves (green storkes).", "Mix dressing, salt and pepper together; add to banana. Serve."]

Title: Raspberry Salad
Ingredients: ["2 (3 oz.) pkg. raspberry jello", "2 c. boiling water", "2 cans frozen raspberries or strawberries", "1/2 pt. whipping cream", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese (Philadelphia)", "colored mini-marshmallows"]
Recipe: ["Start to whip whipping cream and add the package of cream cheese.", "Set aside.", "Mix the water and jello.", "Add the frozen berries and let set.", "After the cream and cream cheese are mixed, put on top of set jello.", "Add colored mini-marshmallows."]

Title: Strawberry Buttermilk Salad

Recipe: ["Mix pineapple and jello; heat to boiling and then let cool. When cool, mix in buttermilk, nuts and Cool Whip.", "Pour into bowl or mold and chill until firm."]

Title: Chicken Fritters

Recipe: ["Bring to a boil the butter, salt, pepper and chicken broth. Add flour all at once to the boiled mixture, stirring constantly until mixtures leaves side of pan.", "Cool 3 to 5 minutes.", "Beat in eggs, one at a time, beating until smooth and glossy after each addition.", "Mix in chicken.", "Drop by teaspoonfuls into hot fat. Drain on paper towels."]

Title: Ham Barbecue
Ingredients: ["1 Small Bottle of Ketchup (12 or 16 ounces)", "1 tsp. of Yellow Mustard", "2 Tbsp. of Apple Cider Vinegar", "5 Tbsp. of Brown Sugar", "1 lb. of Chipped Ham or Chipped Baked Ham"]
Recipe: ["Mix all of the ingredients together and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and add the ham.", "Simmer until the ham is thoroughly heated through."]

Title: Soul Gumbo
Ingredients: ["2 c. water", "2 (14 1/2 oz.) cans Cajun-style stewed tomatoes", "1/4 tsp. hot pepper sauce", "1/2 tsp. Cajun seasoning", "2 garlic cloves, minced", "1 medium onion, sliced", "1/3 c. uncooked regular rice", "1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen cut okra, thawed", "2 (15 oz.) cans black-eyed peas, drained", "1 1/2 c. medium shrimp"]

Title: Benedictine Sandwich Spread
Ingredients: ["1 large cucumber", "8 oz. cream cheese, softened", "1 small onion, grated", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "2 to 3 drops green food coloring"]
Recipe: ["Pare, grate and drain cucumber.", "Combine cucumber with remaining ingredients.", "A favorite sandwich spread or can be thinned with milk or sour cream to make a delightful vegetable or chip dip."]

Title: Hamburger Dills
Ingredients: ["3 sprigs dill", "2 garlic cloves", "2 sliced onions", "25 to 30 medium to large cucumbers", "1 pt. water", "1 qt. 5% vinegar", "2 1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. pickling salt"]
Recipe: ["Wash and slice cucumbers 1/8 to 1/4 inch thick.", "Soak for 1 hour in ice water.", "Add ice cubes or crushed ice.", "Mix water, vinegar, sugar and salt; bring to boil.", "Pack cucumbers into clean, hot jars with 3 sprigs of dill, 2 garlic cloves and onion.", "Pour boiling hot pickling syrup over cucumbers, leaving 1/2 inch headspace.", "Wipe off jar mouth and seal.", "Process in boiling water bath canner for 15 minutes.", "(Count processing time as soon as hot jars are placed into actively boiling water.)"]

Ingredients: ["2 pkg. (8 oz.) cream cheese, softened", "2 c. Cheddar cheese, shredded", "1 Tbsp. grated onion", "1 Tbsp. grated green pepper", "1 tsp. lemon juice", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/2 c. chopped walnuts"]
Recipe: ["Combine all ingredients.", "Mix well.", "Shape into a ball. Sprinkle with chopped walnuts.", "Refrigerate to set.", "Serve with crackers."]

Title: Cottage Cheese Salad

Recipe: ["Mix sugar and pineapple; bring to boil.", "Add jello.", "Mix well. Let cool.", "Blend in Cool Whip and cottage cheese.", "Let set 2 hours in fridge before serving."]

Title: Bow Tie Pasta With Sausage And Creamy Tomato Sauce
Ingredients: ["12 oz. Italian sausage, removed from casing", "1 (16 oz.) can crushed tomatoes", "1 1/2 tsp. minced garlic", "1/2 c. heavy cream", "3 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "1 lb. bow tie pasta"]
Recipe: ["Cook sausage over medium heat, breaking up clumps.", "Pour fat from skillet.", "Add tomatoes and garlic.", "Reduce heat to medium-low.", "Cover and simmer 10 minutes.", "Skim off excess fat. Title: Sweet Fruitcake

Add remaining ingredients, stir by hand until combined.", "Pour into prepared pan. Bake for 75 to 85 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.", "Cool in pan for 30 minutes, loosen edges and remove from pan.", "Cool completely, wrap in foil or plastic wrap and store in refrigerator."]

Title: Shrimp Salad
Ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) vermicelli, cut in bite-size, cooked and drained", "1 c. chopped green peppers", "1 c. chopped onions", "1 c. sweet pickle relish", "1 small jar drained pimento", "2 bags frozen cocktail shrimp", "salt to taste", "little Accent", "1 c. mayo"]

Title: King'S Arms Tavern Peanut Soup(Servings 10 To 12)

Title: Shrimp Salad

Cheddar cheese, cut in small pieces", "2 tomatoes, cut in pieces", "1 tsp. grated onion", "1/4 c. chopped sweet pickles", "mayonnaise", "salt and pepper to taste"]
Recipe: ["Mix ingredients together.", "Add enough mayonnaise to moisten. Chill until ready to serve."]

Title: Goo-Losh

Title: Sharon'S Teriyaki Marinade
Ingredients: ["1 c. soy sauce", "1/3 c. olive oil", "1/3 c. wine", "2 Tbsp. brown sugar", "4 cloves garlic, chopped", "1/2 tsp. ground ginger or freshly grated", "1 tsp. fresh ground black pepper"]

Recipe: ["Using turkey gravy or broth as a base, add all other ingredients to it and stir together.", "Cook on low heat for 2 to 3 hours."]

Title: Old-Fashioned Chocolate Ice Cream
Ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. granulated gelatin (unflavored)", "1/2 c. cold water", "1 c. rich milk", "1 1/2 c. (1 lb. can) Hershey's chocolate flavored syrup", "3/4 c. granulated sugar", "few grains salt", "1 pt. light cream", "1 pt. heavy cream", "2 Tbsp. vanilla"]
Recipe: ["Allow the gelatin to soak in the water in a saucepan for 5 minutes.", "Add the milk and heat, stirring until the gelatin is dissolved.", "Remove from heat and add the chocolate syrup, sugar and salt.", "Cool; add the creams and the vanilla.", "Freeze in crank freezer (can use electric).", "Makes 4 quarts."]

Title: Peanut Butter Balls

Recipe: ["Cream peanut butter and margarine until smooth.", "Add confectioners sugar and mix with hands.", "Shape into balls (small ones about the size of marbles).", "Melt chocolate by putting in small bowl; place this bowl into larger one with hot water from tap.", "Stir until chocolate melts.", "Dip balls into chocolate and place on waxed paper."]

Title: Congealed Strawberry Salad

Recipe: ["Dissolve Jello in 2 cups boiling water.", "Add fruits undrained.", "Refrigerate for several hours to congeal."]

Title: Persimmon Cookies

Recipe: ["In large skillet, brown beef and onion; drain off fat.", "Add remaining ingredients and mix well.", "Cover and cook over low heat for 20 to 25 minutes, stirring the mixture occasionally.", "Makes 4 servings."]

Title: Pink Salad
Ingredients: ["1 can fruit cocktail, drained", "1 box strawberry jello", "12 oz. cottage cheese", "1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip", "nuts"]

Title: Cucumbers

Recipe: ["Mix together.", "Place in a jar and refrigerate.", "Keeps very well.", "Do not add any water to this recipe."]

Title: Daddy Gene'S Pie

Recipe: ["Place ice cream in mixing bowl.", "Stir just enough to soften. Fold in peanut butter, then Cool Whip.", "Spoon into graham cracker crusts.", "Freeze 4 to 5 hours before serving.", "Makes 2 pies.", "Will keep several weeks in freezer."]

Title: Bread And Butter Pickles
Ingredients: ["6 qt. sliced cucumbers", "3 green peppers, sliced (2 1/2 c.)", "4 1/2 cloves garlic", "7 1/2 c. sugar", "2 1/4 tsp. turmeric", "3 Tbsp. mustard seed", "8 to 10 medium onions", "1/2 c. pickling salt", "4 1/2 c. vinegar", "2 1/2 tsp. celery seed"]
Recipe: ["Combine cucumbers, onions, green peppers and whole garlic cloves.", "Add salt; cover with ice and mix thoroughly.", "Let stand 3 hours.", "Drain well; remove garlic.", "Combine remaining ingredients; pour over cucumber mixture.", "Bring to a boil.", "Fill hot jars; adjust lids.", "Process in boiling water bath for 5 minutes.", "Makes 12 pints."]

Title: Cheese And Vegetable Chowder
Ingredients: ["4 Tbsp. margarine", "1/4 c. finely chopped onion", "1 c. chopped green pepper", "1 c. pared sliced carrot", "1 c. pared diced potato", "1 pkg. Recipe: ["In hot margarine in 3-quart saucepan cook vegetables, covered, stirring occasionally, 20 to 25 minutes or until tender.", "Remove from heat.", "Stir in flour; mix well.", "Cook 1 minute, stirring occasionally.", "Add chicken broth to vegetable mixture.", "Bring to boiling, stirring constantly.", "Gradually stir in cheese.", "Cook over medium heat, stirring until cheese has melted.", "Gradually add milk. Season with salt and pepper.", "Bring just to boiling, but do not boil.", "Sprinkle with parsley; serve with croutons.", "Makes 6 to 8 servings."]

Title: Pimento Cheese Spread
Ingredients: ["8 oz. extra sharp cheese", "1 small jar pimentos", "2 to 3 Tbsp. Dukes mayonnaise", "2 tsp. granulated sugar", "salt", "pepper"]

Title: Frosty Fruit Punch

Recipe: ["Prepare orange juice and pineapple juice according to package directions.", "Prepare lemonade using 3 cans of water.", "Combine juices; chill at least 2 hours.", "When ready to serve, pour mixture into punch bowl.", "Add ginger ale, stirring gently to combine.", "Add sherbets to mixture in small scoops.", "Yields about 1 1/4 gallons."]

Title: Chili Chicken
Ingredients: ["3 lb. chicken (approximately)", "10 corn tortillas", "1/2 b. Cheddar cheese", "1/2 lb. Jack cheese", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "1 can cream of chicken soup", "1 (6 oz.) can chili salsa", "1 c. chicken broth", "1 can chili with beans"]

Recipe: ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Shape into 8 patties.", "Chill. Brown over charcoal fire or broil on rack in broiling pan.", "Serves 4."]

Title: Carrot Cake 2
Ingredients: ["2 c. plain flour", "1 1/2 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "2 c. sugar", "2 grated carrots", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "2 tsp. baking powder", "2 tsp. cinnamon", "4 eggs", "1 1/2 c. oil", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/2 c. flaked coconut"]
Recipe: ["Sift together the dry ingredients.", "Mix eggs, oil, and sugar. Add dry ingredients a little at a time and beat well after each addition.", "Fold in carrots, pineapple, and nuts.", "Bake at 350 degrees in three 9 inch cake pans."]

Title: Tagliarini
Ingredients: ["1 1/4 lb. ground beef", "1 green pepper", "1 onion", "2 cloves garlic", "2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "salt", "1 can tomato paste", "1 can creamed corn", "1 can ripe olives and juice", "1/4 lb. grated cheese", "1 pkg. broad noodles"]
Recipe: ["Brown meat, pepper, onion and garlic in hot shortening or oil. Add tomato paste and other vegetables and let simmer about 30 minutes."]

Title: Fruit Jello
Ingredients: ["8 oz. Cool Whip", "12 oz. cottage cheese (small curd)", "small box strawberry jello", "15 oz. fruit cocktail, drained", "cut up banana"]
Recipe: ["Do not add water. Mix jello, cottage cheese and Cool Whip, then add fruit cocktail and banana. Mix well and chill."]

Title: Crabmeat Mornay
Ingredients: ["1 stick butter", "1 small bunch green onions, chopped", "1/2 c. finely chopped parsley", "2 Tbsp. flour", "1 pt. breakfast cream", "1/2 lb. grated Swiss cheese", "1 Tbsp. sherry wine or Zinfandel wine", "red pepper to taste", "salt to taste", "1 lb. white crabmeat", "few drops of Tabasco"]
Recipe: ["Melt butter in heavy pot and saute onions and parsley.", "Blend in flour, cream and cheese until cheese is melted.", "Add other ingredients and gently fold in crabmeat.", "This may be served in a chafing dish with Melba toast or in pastry shells."]

Title: Pepperoncini Cream Cheese Dip
Ingredients: ["1 (10 oz.) jar pepperoncini (salad peppers), drained and stemmed", "8 oz. cream cheese", "1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese", "1/2 c. sour cream"]
Recipe: ["Combine all ingredients in food processor.", "Serve with crackers.", "Good and zingy."]

Title: Ballerina Bubbles
Ingredients: ["4 c. hot tap water", "1/4 c. Ivory liquid"]
Recipe: ["Mix gently and let stand of 1 hour before using.", "(I sometimes add food coloring for fun.)"]

Title: Quick Clam Chowder
Ingredients: ["1 pkg. boxed scalloped potatoes", "1 (7 to 8 oz.) can minced clams, drained", "1 Tbsp. shredded green onion", "2 1/2 c. milk", "1 Tbsp. butter", "1 Tbsp. freeze dried green pepper"]
Recipe: ["In large saucepan, mix potatoes slices, sauce mix, water and milk called for on package, clam liquor, green onion and green pepper.", "Heat to boil, stirring occasionally.", "Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 25 minutes or until potatoes are tender.", "Stir in clams, milk and butter.", "Heat through."]

Title: Fruit Punch
Ingredients: ["1 (12 oz.) can frozen orange juice", "1 (12 oz.) can frozen lemonade", "1 (46 oz.) can unsweetened pineapple juice", "1 qt. ginger ale"]
Recipe: ["Dilute\tfrozen\tjuice as directed on can. Add pineapple juice and", "mix.", "At", "serving", "time, add ginger ale.", "Yields 40 servings."]

Title: Minestrone Soup
Ingredients: ["1 (28 oz.) can tomatoes", "1 lb. hamburger", "1 onion, chopped", "1 green pepper", "1 qt. water", "2 (8 oz.) cans tomato sauce", "2 c. beef broth", "1 Tbsp. dried parsley", "1/2 tsp. ground basil", "1 (15 oz.) can kidney beans", "1 tsp. dried oregano", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "1/2 tsp. garlic salt", "1 (15 oz.) can garbanzo beans", "1 (16 oz.) can green beans", "1 1/4 c. macaroni, uncooked", "Parmesan cheese (for garnish)"]
Recipe: ["Cook hamburger, onion, and green pepper and drain.", "Puree tomatoes in blender.", "Add to hamburger mixture with water, carrots, tomato sauce, broth, parsley, basil, oregano, pepper and garlic salt.", "Cover and simmer for about 20 minutes."]

Title: Shrimp Stuffing
Ingredients: ["1/2 c. chopped celery", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1/4 c. chopped onion", "2 Tbsp. butter", "2 c. cornbread stuffing mix", "1 c. chopped cooked shrimp", "1/4 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing", "1 Tbsp. snapped parsley", "dash of cayenne pepper", "2 Tbsp. melted butter"]
Recipe: ["Cook celery, green pepper and onion in butter until tender. Prepare stuffing mix. Stir in vegetables, shrimp, mayo, parsley and cayenne."]

Title: Quick Maple Syrup
Ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1 c. hot water", "2 tsp. maple extract", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
Recipe: ["Melt sugar in hot water. Bring to boil and remove from heat. Stir in vanilla and maple flavoring."]

Title: Fire Roasted Corn And Poblano Tacos
Ingredients: ["1 Tbsp. butter", "1 small white onion, finely diced", "2 garlic cloves, peeled, sliced", "1 large poblano chile, roasted, peeled, seeded, diced", "3 ears fresh yellow corn, roasted in husks until tender or 2 c. frozen corn kernels", "dash of salt", "1 tsp. toasted dried Mexican oregano", "juice of 1 lime", "4 oz. Chihuahua cheese, grated", "2 oz. grated parmesan or romano cheese", "1 Tbsp. vegetable oil", "12 corn tortillas", "lime wedges for garnish, optional"]
Recipe: ["Heat butter in a heavy saute pan or saucepan over medium-high heat.", "Cook onion 1 minute, until slightly browned on edges.", "Add garlic and saute 1 minute. until slightly browned on edges.", "Add garlic and saute 1 minute more.", "Add poblano, corn, salt and oregano; remove from heat and stir to combine.", "Then add lime juice, Chihuahua cheese and parmesan.", "Stir.", "Brush a griddle, comal or heavy skillet with a light coating of oil.", "Bring to medium-high heat.", "Place a few tortillas on hot skillet; fill tortillas, reserving part of filling for garnish.", "When tortillas are softened, fold over to make tacos.", "Cook until golden brown on both sides.", "Garnish with extra cheese and lime wedges as desired. Makes 12 tacos."]

Title: Venison Roast
Ingredients: ["3 to 4 lb. venison roast", "3 c. diced potatoes", "2 c. sliced carrots", "1 medium onion, sliced", "1 pkg. Schilling brand pot roast seasons with roasting bag", "1 c. water (additional, not optional)"]
Recipe: ["Place trimmed and boned roast inside roasting bag; add seasonings, potatoes, carrots and onion.", "Add water per package directions, then add additional water.", "(Venison has no marbled fat, so will cook drier.)", "Seal roasting bag closed."]

Title: Blueberry Jello Salad
Ingredients: ["6 oz. pkg. blackberry jello", "2 c. boiling water", "1 can blueberries", "1 can crushed pineapple", "8 oz. sour cream", "8 oz. cream cheese", "2/3 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "chopped nuts (optional)"]
Recipe: ["Dissolve jello in 2 cups boiling water.", "Drain blueberries and pineapple.", "Save juices.", "Combine the two juices and measure 1/2 cup to add to the jello mixture.", "Refrigerate jello and let set partially, then add the drained blueberries and pineapple.", "Let set until firm.", "Then combine sour cream, cream cheese, sugar and vanilla.", "Whip together.", "Spread on top of jello.", "Sprinkle with nuts, if desired."]

Title: Greenbriar Beef Stroganoff
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. sirloin tip roast, cut in 1/4-inch strips", "1/2 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. paprika", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1/4 lb. mushrooms, sliced", "1 small onion, chopped", "1 clove garlic, crushed", "2 Tbsp. butter", "3 Tbsp. flour", "2 Tbsp. tomato paste", "1 (11 oz.) can beef bouillon", "1 c. sour cream", "1 tsp. lemon juice", "2 Tbsp. sherry"]
Recipe: ["Combine 1/2 cup flour, salt and paprika and dredge meat.", "Melt 2 tablespoons of butter in a large, heavy skillet and brown meat quickly.", "Add mushrooms, onion and garlic and cook until tender. Remove meat and mushrooms from skillet.", "Add 2 tablespoons of butter and blend in 3 tablespoons of flour.", "Stir in tomato paste. Slowly add bouillon and cook, stirring constantly until thickened.", "Return meat and mushrooms to skillet.", "Just before serving, stir in sour cream, lemon juice and sherry.", "Heat; do not boil.", "Serves 6."]

Title: Quick Chili Beans
Ingredients: ["1 small onion, diced", "1 lb. ground beef", "1 pkg. French's Chili-O seasoning", "16 oz. can stewed tomatoes", "2 (14 oz.) cans pinto beans", "1/2 c. water"]
Recipe: ["Brown beef in skillet with onion; drain.", "Stir in remaining ingredients.", "Bring to a boil and simmer 10 minutes, stirring occasionally."]

Title: Sauteed Fish Fillets
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. fish fillets (cod, haddock, sole, flounder)", "1/2 c. milk", "1/2 c. wheat germ", "2 shallots, chopped", "1 1/2 Tbsp. cold pressed oil", "2 1/2 Tbsp. butter", "3 Tbsp. parsley, minced", "1 lemon, cut into wedges"]
Recipe: ["Dip fish in", "milk,", "then in wheat germ.", "Saute shallots in oil and butter in", "a", "skillet", "for", "2 minutes, then add the fish. Cook briefly, 3 minutes on one side and 2 on the other. Do\tnot cook", "until", "the", "fish", "is dry and comes apart.", "When serving, toss", "minced", "parsley over.", "Add lemon wedges on the side.\tServes 4."]

Title: French Silk Pie
Ingredients: ["1/2 c. real butter", "3/4 c. sugar", "3 sq. unsweetened chocolate, melted and cooled", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 eggs", "1 chocolate wafer crust, graham cracker crust or regular crust", "whipped cream"]
Recipe: ["In mixing bowl, cream the butter; gradually add sugar.", "Cream until light and fluffy.", "Blend in unsweetened chocolate and vanilla.", "Add eggs, one at a time, beating 3 minutes after each addition (medium speed). Turn filling into chocolate wafer crust, graham cracker crust or regular crust.", "Chill several hours.", "Top with whipped cream."]

Title: Chili Beans
Ingredients: ["1 lb. hamburger meat (80% to 90% lean)", "2 cans Ranch Style beans", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "2 Tbsp. chili powder", "1 tsp. garlic powder"]
Recipe: ["Brown meat and drain.", "Mix beans, meat, onion, garlic and chili powder.", "Cook in crock-pot.", "Simmer for about 30 minutes (low)."]

Title: Fruit Nut Balls
Ingredients: ["1 c. raisins", "1 c. pitted dates", "1 c. pitted prunes", "1 c. dried apricots", "1 c. nuts"]
Recipe: ["Grind in food processor.", "Mix well and roll in powdered sugar or chopped nuts.", "Or mix with 1 tablespoon orange juice, or 1/4 cup honey, 3 tablespoons butter and 1/2 teaspoon vanilla (mixed and barely warmed).", "Then roll in nuts."]

Title: Timko'S Cream Of Po-Cheesy Soup
Ingredients: ["2 large or 3 medium potatoes, cubed", "2 c. water", "1/2 c. butter", "1/2 c. margarine", "1/2 c. chopped celery", "1/4 c. chopped onions", "1 c. flour", "4 tsp. granular chicken bouillon or 4 crushed chicken bouillon cubes", "6 c. cold milk", "1/2 lb. shredded or small cubed Cheddar cheese", "1 c. cubed ham (if desired)"]
Recipe: ["Cook potatoes until tender in water, but do not overcook. Saute onions and celery in melted butter and margarine.", "Add flour and chicken bouillon and stir to blend.", "Add milk and stir until thick and smooth.", "Add cooked potato cubes and their cooking liquid.", "Add and stir in Cheddar cheese until it melts.", "If desired, add ham.", "Season with white pepper."]

Title: Gazpacho
Ingredients: ["2 medium cucumbers, peeled and diced", "1 1/4 lb. fresh tomatoes (about 4), peeled and diced", "1 small can diced green chilies", "salt", "1 Tbsp. tomato puree", "1 large onion, chopped", "2 small red and green sweet peppers, diced", "1/2 c. wine vinegar", "4 c. cold water", "2 garlic cloves, minced", "2 c. bread crumbs", "4 Tbsp. olive oil"]
Recipe: ["To save time, put all in a food processor and let it do the chopping.", "May add an avocado (diced) before serving.", "Cover and refrigerate at least 1 hour. Stir before serving and add chopped onions."]

Title: Peanut Butter Bar Cookies
Ingredients: ["15 graham cracker sq.", "12 oz. peanut butter", "1 box 4x sugar", "2 sticks butter", "2 large Hershey bars (1/2 lb.)"]
Recipe: ["Mix all the ingredients together except the Hershey bars.", "Put mix in a 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Melt chocolate and spread over mixture. Crucial:", "You must refrigerate 45 minutes and then cut into bars."]

Title: Orange Balls
Ingredients: ["1 bag vanilla wafers, crushed", "1 stick butter, melted", "1 small can frozen orange juice", "1 bag crushed pecans", "2 c. coconut"]
Recipe: ["Mix all 4 ingredients together well in bowl.", "Then spoon out and roll into balls.", "Take coconut and put 1 cup of coconut in two small bowls.", "Color with food coloring, if desired, and then roll ball in it.", "Place on dish and keep chilled until you serve."]

Title: Sausage Gravy
Ingredients: ["1 lb. bulk sausage", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "6 Tbsp. flour", "1 qt. milk", "1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning", "1/2 tsp. nutmeg", "1/4 tsp. salt", "dash of hot pepper sauce"]
Recipe: ["Cook crumbled sausage; drain on paper towels.", "Stir in onion; cook until transparent.", "Stir in flour and a little of the milk. Stir and cook over medium heat for 6 minutes.", "Stir in the rest of the milk.", "Add seasonings; cook until thickened.", "Serve over fresh baked biscuits.", "Enjoy."]

Title: Macaroni And Broccoli
Ingredients: ["1 bunch broccoli", "1 lb. pasta (short or linguini)", "1/2 to 3/4 c. olive oil", "3/4 c. basil leaves (fresh), chopped", "salt and pepper to taste", "4 cloves garlic", "3/4 c. grated Parmesan or Romano cheese"]
Recipe: ["Cut and peel broccoli stems.", "Cut 1-inch pieces.", "Blanch a few minutes before flowerets.", "If flowerets are large, cut smaller. Chop garlic.", "Saute in oil until golden.", "Cook pasta.", "Drain and place in bowl.", "Top with garlic, oil, basil leaves and cheese.", "Add broccoli.", "Mix well.", "Use Ronzoni ziti or fettuccini."]

Title: Peanut Butter And Jelly Sandwiches
Ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. crunchy peanut butter", "2 Tbsp. blackberry jelly", "2 slices Sunbeam bread"]
Recipe: ["Take your bread and spread your jelly on both pieces of bread. Then spread peanut butter on top of the jelly.", "Smash the breads together and eat it!"]

Title: Japanese Fruit Cake
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 sticks margarine", "3 eggs", "2 1/2 c. plain flour", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1 c. milk", "1 tsp. vanilla flavoring", "1/2 tsp. lemon flavoring", "1 1/2 c. chopped fig preserves", "1 tsp. cloves", "1 tsp. allspice", "1 tsp. cinnamon"]
Recipe: ["Cream margarine and sugar.", "Add eggs and beat.", "Add baking powder and flour which has been sifted together.", "Alternate with milk.", "Add flavorings.", "Mix well.", "Bake one layer of this in greased and floured pan.", "To rest of mixture, add fig preserves, cloves, allspice and cinnamon.", "Bake this in two layers in greased and floured pan.", "When done, let cool and put plain layer in middle."]

Title: Chicken Frecaissee
Ingredients: ["4 - 6 boneless chicken breasts", "1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. black pepper", "1/4 c. shortening", "1/2 c. celery, chopped", "1/4 c. onion, chopped", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "1 small jar pimentos", "3/4 c. water"]
Recipe: ["Mix flour, salt and pepper. Coat chicken in flour mixture. Heat shortening in skillet; brown chicken. Put browned chicken in baking dish. Set aside."]

Title: Sweet Minglers Recipe
Ingredients: ["1 pkg (6 oz, 1 c.) semi-sweet chocolate morsels", "1/4 c. peanut butter", "6 c. Crispix cereal", "1 c. powdered sugar"]
Recipe: ["In large microwave bowl, melt chocolate on high for one minute.", "Stir and heat another 30 seconds on high or until melted. Stir in peanut better.", "Gently stir Crispix cereal into chocolate-peanut butter mixture until well coated.", "Place powdered sugar in 2 gallon freezer storage bag, add coated cereal to sugar and close bag.", "Gently toss cereal mixture until well coated. Store in air tight container in refrigerator."]

Title: Chocolate Pie
Ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "5 to 6 Tbsp. flour", "1 3/4 c. milk", "1/2 stick butter", "3 eggs", "5 to 6 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
Recipe: ["Place on low heat until thickened.", "Pour in vanilla flavoring, then pour in cool, baked pie crust."]

Title: Barbecue Black-Eyes
Ingredients: ["4 slices bacon", "1 onion, chopped", "1 rib celery, sliced", "1 carrot, diced", "3 c. cooked black-eyed beans", "1 c. bean liquid", "1/4 c. barbecue sauce", "1 tsp. prepared mustard", "1/2 c. green pepper, diced", "1 c. barbecue potato chips, coarsely crushed"]
Recipe: ["In a large skillet, cook bacon strips until crisp.", "Remove from pan. Add onion, celery and carrot to drippings in pan and cook until tender, stirring frequently. Add beans, liquid, barbecue sauce and mustard.", "Mix lightly.", "Cook over low heat 15 minutes, adding more liquid if needed.", "Stir in green pepper and barbecue chips.", "Let simmer 5 minutes longer.", "Serve topped with bacon."]

Title: Celery Seed Dressing For Fruit Salad
Ingredients: ["1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. dry mustard", "1 tsp. salt", "1/4 onion, grated", "1/3 c. vinegar", "1 c. salad oil", "1 Tbsp. celery seed"]
Recipe: ["Measure dry ingredients into a small mixing bowl.", "Mix sugar, salt and mustard and add onion juice and a small amount of vinegar. Add oil gradually, then remaining vinegar and celery seed."]

Title: Pizza Hot Dish
Ingredients: ["2 eggs", "1/2 c. milk", "1 (7 oz.) pkg. elbow macaroni, cooked and drained", "1 lb. ground beef", "1 medium onion, chopped", "1 (10 3/4 oz.) can condensed tomato soup", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. dried oregano", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese"]
Recipe: ["In a medium bowl, beat eggs.", "Add milk and macaroni.", "Pour into a greased 9 x 13 x 2-inch baking dish.", "Set aside."]

Title: Homemade Bread
Ingredients: ["2 pkg. active dry yeast or 2 cakes yeast", "1/2 c. warm water (110~ to 115~)", "3 1/2 c. water (85~)", "10 to 12 c. Robin Hood flour", "1/4 c. sugar", "2 Tbsp. salt", "1/4 c. soft shortening"]
Recipe: ["In mixing bowl, dissolve yeast in water; add remaining water, sugar, salt, shortening and several cups flour.", "Beat with spoon until smooth and batter falls from spoon in sheets.", "Mix in (by hand) enough flour until dough cleans the bowl."]

Title: Quick Rolls
Ingredients: ["1 c. warm water", "1 pkg. yeast", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "1/3 c. salad oil", "3 c. flour"]
Recipe: ["Place water, yeast, sugar, oil and salt in a large bowl.", "Add flour, a small amount at a time, until it makes a stiff dough that can be rolled out (may take more than 3 cups)."]

Title: Cheese Ball
Ingredients: ["1 lb. sharp cheese, shredded", "1 small onion, minced", "3 Tbsp. green pepper, minced", "1/2 c. pickles, minced (I use more)", "1 Tbsp. pimento, minced", "1/4 c. mayonnaise", "1 tsp. salt", "1 small (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese"]
Recipe: ["Mix all", "ingredients.", "Roll into a ball and chill until serving.", "Can roll into ball with chopped pecans, if desired."]

Title: Mushrooms In Sour Cream
Ingredients: ["1 lb. mushrooms (unpeeled)", "1/2 medium onion", "salt (to taste)", "pepper (to taste)", "1 c. butter", "8 oz. (1 pkg.) cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. flour"]
Recipe: ["Wash mushrooms and slice thin (both stems and caps).", "Add onions, salt and pepper.", "Bring to a boil.", "Turn off heat. Tightly cover pan and let sit for a few minutes (until mushrooms become limp), stirring frequently to prevent burning.", "Add butter."]

Title: Strawberry Salad
Ingredients: ["1 pkg. cream cheese", "1 cup mayonnaise", "1/2 cup marshmallows (cut up fine)", "1 lb. strawberries chopped (can use frozen)", "1 cup drained crushed pineapple", "1 small carton cool whip", "1 cup nuts (chopped)"]
Recipe: ["Beat cream cheese and mayonnaise until fluffy.", "Add pineapple, strawberries, and nuts.", "Fold in marshmallows and cool whip.", "Chill."]

Title: Potato Candy
Ingredients: ["1 medium potato", "1 Tbsp. butter", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 lb. powdered sugar or more", "peanut butter (smooth or crunchy)"]
Recipe: ["Have powdered sugar, butter and vanilla ready.", "Boil potato with skin on.", "Peel and mash while hot.", "Add butter and vanilla while potato is still hot.", "Continue adding sugar as long as mixture will absorb it.", "Mixture becomes like pie dough.", "Roll out with rolling pin on wax paper sprinkled with powdered sugar. Spread with peanut butter and roll up like jelly roll.", "Slice off 1/2 inch slices.", "Candy should be refrigerated if not used at one sitting.", "At Christmas, red or green food coloring can be used."]

Title: Baked Clams Diablo
Ingredients: ["2 c. clams", "1/2 c. celery", "1/2 c. onion", "red and black pepper", "2 cloves garlic", "Tabasco sauce", "1/4 lb. bacon", "1 c. clam broth", "1 c. bread crumbs", "pinch of thyme", "1 Tbsp. parsley", "2 doz. clam shells"]
Recipe: ["Chop clams, celery, onion and garlic in food processor or by hand, very finely.", "Cut bacon in slivers, fry; remove bacon and set aside.", "Saute clam mixture in bacon drippings; add clam broth, seasonings and bread crumbs.", "Stir over low heat until mixture reaches consistency of moist stuffing.", "Spoon into clam shells. Top with bacon bits and brown under broiler.", "Serve with Tabasco sauce."]

Title: Low-Fat Tartar Sauce
Ingredients: ["1 c. low-fat mayonnaise (I recommend Smart Beat)", "1 tsp. each: onion, pimento, green pepper and dill pickle, chopped", "1 Tbsp. tomato sauce"]
Recipe: ["Mix all ingredients together."]

Title: Cocoa Nog
Ingredients: ["1/2 c. dried egg powder", "3 1/4 c. dry milk powder", "1/4 c. cocoa powder"]
Recipe: ["Mix all ingredients thoroughly.", "Makes 4 cups mix."]

Title: Holiday Broccoli Soup
Ingredients: ["1/2 c. chopped onion", "2 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "2 pkg. (10 oz. each) Birds Eye broccoli with cheese sauce", "2 c. chicken broth", "1/2 c. heavy cream", "pepper to taste"]
Recipe: ["Saute onions in butter until tender, but not browned.", "Add vegetables with sauce, chicken broth, cream and pepper.", "Cook over medium heat until thoroughly heated, about 5 minutes.", "Makes 5 1/2 cups or 6 servings."]

Title: Cheesy Salmon Patties
Ingredients: ["1 (15 oz.) can pink salmon", "1 egg, beaten", "1/4 c. buttermilk", "1/2 c. self-rising flour", "3 oz. shredded sharp Cheddar cheese", "1/4 c. vegetable oil"]
Recipe: ["Flake salmon with a fork.", "Add milk, flour, egg and cheese, stirring well.", "Shape mixture into 6 patties.", "Heat oil in heavy skillet.", "Cook patties in oil over medium heat for 8 minutes or until golden brown, turning once."]

Title: Pasta Salad
Ingredients: ["7 oz. pasta (any kind)", "1/2 c. Italian dressing", "1 c. mayonnaise", "1 tsp. mustard horseradish", "1 tsp. dill weed", "2 c. diced cucumber", "1 1/2 c. chopped tomatoes", "1 c. sliced pepperoni, cut in half", "1/4 c. green pepper", "1/4 c. green onions", "1 rib celery, chopped", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. pepper"]
Recipe: ["Prepare pasta.", "Toss hot pasta with Italian dressing.", "Let stand.", "Prepare vegetables and pepperoni.", "Combine mayonnaise, mustard and dill weed.", "Set aside.", "Combine pasta and vegetables. Add salt and pepper.", "Add mayonnaise mixture.", "Gently toss.", "Add more mayonnaise if necessary.", "Refrigerate 4 hours before serving. Yields 8 to 10 servings."]

Title: Fried Quail
Ingredients: ["1 quail or more", "salt", "pepper", "1 c. flour"]
Recipe: ["Dress and split quail down the back, leaving breast together. Flatten out each bird with breast down and dust with salt and pepper on each side.", "Roll in flour.", "Place birds in skillet containing hot grease that will come halfway up on the birds. Brown well on all sides and then cover and turn down heat to simmer.", "Simmer 30 to 40 minutes until tender.", "The residue left in skillet may be used to make a cream gravy."]

Title: Methodist Mint Julep
Ingredients: ["2 c. water", "2 1/2 c. sugar", "6 lemons", "2 oranges", "grated rind of 1 orange", "large handful fresh mint leaves or 3 Tbsp. dried mint"]
Recipe: ["Place sugar and water in a saucepan and boil for 10 minutes. Squeeze juice from lemons and oranges.", "Place juices, grated rind and mint in a juice container and add boiled sugar/water mixture. Refrigerate at least 24 hours.", "Mix approximately 1 1/2 parts water to 1 part syrup.", "Pour over ice in glasses.", "Mixture may be kept up to 2 weeks in the refrigerator or may be frozen for later use."]

Title: Barbecue Ribs
Ingredients: ["ribs", "barbecue sauce", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. black pepper", "dash of red pepper"]
Recipe: ["Cover ribs with water.", "Add salt and peppers.", "Boil until tender.", "Remove ribs and drain.", "Place in baking dish and add barbecue sauce.", "Marinate in sauce several hours.", "Grill over charcoal fire until slightly charred."]

Title: "Cream" Of Broccoli Soup
Ingredients: ["1 bunch fresh broccoli, chopped", "1 Tbsp. vegetable oil", "1 small onion, minced", "1 glove garlic, minced", "2 c. chicken broth, fat removed", "2 c. low-fat or skim milk", "pepper to taste"]
Recipe: ["In a large saucepan or Dutch oven, saute onion and garlic in vegetable oil until onion is clear but not browned.", "Add the broth and bring to a boil.", "Add the broccoli.", "Reduce heat, cover and simmer until", "broccoli is tender (about 10 minutes).", "Remove from heat; add milk and seasoning.", "Puree in blender.", "Reheat in pan prior to serving.", "Serves 4 to 6."]

Title: Popcorn Cake
Ingredients: ["1/2 c. margarine", "1/2 c. vegetable oil", "1 lb. bag marshmallows", "3 qt. popped corn", "1 lb. salted peanuts", "1 lb. M&M candies"]
Recipe: ["Melt margarine, marshmallows and oil in", "pan over low heat, then cook for 1 minute.", "Add mixture to popcorn, peanuts and M&M's.", "Grease hands with butter; mix all ingredients together and put in greased tube pan.", "Pack this fairly firm in pan and let stand for about 5 minutes.", "Invert onto plate.", "Ready to eat!"]

Title: Hot Fudge Sauce
Ingredients: ["1/2 c. sugar", "3 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 1/2 Tbsp. cornstarch", "dash of salt", "1/2 c. water", "2 Tbsp. margarine", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
Recipe: ["Mix sugar, cocoa, cornstarch and salt.", "Stir in water.", "Cook until thick.", "Add margarine and cook until boiling.", "Then blend in vanilla.", "Can be made in microwave or conventional stove top. Makes 1 cup sauce."]

Title: Potato Salad Dressing
Ingredients: ["1/2 c. sugar", "1/4 c. vinegar", "1 c. Miracle Whip", "1/4 c. yellow mustard", "boiled and peeled potatoes", "chopped celery", "chopped onion", "shredded carrot", "hard-boiled eggs"]
Recipe: ["Dice potatoes.", "Chop celery and onions.", "Shred carrots.", "Boil sugar and vinegar until sugar is dissolved.", "Pour over ingredients and stir.", "Let stand for a few minutes."]

Title: Almond Butter Crunch
Ingredients: ["1 cup butter or margarine", "1 Tbsp. light corn syrup", "1 1/3 cups sugar", "3 Tbsp. water", "1 cup coarsely chopped almonds, toasted", "4-4 1/2 oz. milk chocolate bars, melted", "1 cup finely chopped almonds, toasted"]
Recipe: ["In a large sauce pan, melt butter; add sugar, corn syrup and water. Cook; stirring occasionally, to hard-crack stage (300 degrees). Quickly stir coarsely chopped nuts; spread in ungreased 13x9 inch pan. Cool thoroughly. Turn out on waxed paper; spread top with half the chocolate; sprinkle with half the finely chopped almonds. Cover with waxed paper, invert. Spread with chocolate; sprinkle with remaining nuts. If necessary, chill to firm, crack in pieces."]

Title: Diablos Con Queso

Title: Italian Sausage Soup

Pour into six 2-cup freezer containers with tight fitting lids. Cut through mixture with knife to remove air pockets.", "Attach lids. Label containers with date and contents.", "Store in freezer.", "Use within 3 months.", "Makes Sloppy Joes, Beef Stroganoff, Hearty Beef Chowder, Chili, Rice Creole and Company Casserole."]

Title: Cheese Soup

Worcestershire sauce", "1/4 c. sliced almonds"]

Title: Salsa

Title: Lasagna

Parmesan cheese", "1 small carton cottage cheese"]
Recipe: ["Simmer tomato paste, sauce, salt and Italian seasoning in uncovered pan.", "Cook onion, garlic and ground beef in another pan until brown.", "Add tomato sauce mixture and simmer until thickened (about 1 to 1 1/2 hours).", "Add 1 bay leaf 1/2 hour before done."]

Title: Fruit Crunch

Recipe: ["Combine first 4 ingredients.", "Blend the next 3 ingredients. Stir", "into\ttuna", "mixture.\t Form 4", "patties.", "Fry\tin lightly oiled skillet for 5 minutes, or", "until browned.", "Serve on buns with lettuce and tomato."]

Title: Seasoned Salt

Title: Grandma'S Cranberry Salad
Ingredients: ["1 pkg. fresh cranberries", "3/4 c. sugar", "grapes, cut in half and seeded if necessary", "miniature marshmallows", "broken nuts (walnuts or pecans)", "pineapple chunks (with juice)", "2 Tbsp. flour", "heavy cream, whipped with vanilla"]
Recipe: ["Grind the cranberries.", "Add sugar and mix.", "Heat pineapple juice with flour.", "Will thicken as it cools.", "Set aside until cool.", "Mix cranberry-sugar mixture with grapes, mini marshmallows, nuts and pineapple chunks.", "Add cooled juice-flour mixture.", "Mix. Title: Chicken And Dumplings
Ingredients: ["2 to 3 lb. chicken, cut into pieces", "1 1/2 qt. cold water", "3 c. flour", "1 walnut size lump butter", "3/4 c. milk"]
Recipe: ["Cook chicken on medium heat for 1 hour.", "Take meat from bone; save or reserve to pour into chicken dumpling broth.", "Stir flour, butter and milk together until consistency stiff as pie crust dough.", "Lay onto slightly floured cutting board; roll with rolling pin until thin.", "Cut dough with knife into desired size pieces. Title: Chicken With Lime Butter
Ingredients: ["6 to 8 split chicken breasts, skinned and boned", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. pepper", "1/4 or less cooking oil", "1 lime, juiced", "6 Tbsp. butter", "1 tsp. fresh chives, minced", "1/2 tsp. dill weed"]
Recipe: ["Sprinkle chicken on both sides with salt and pepper.", "In large frying pan, place oil and heat to medium temperature.", "Add chicken; saute about 4 minutes, or until light brown.", "Turn chicken; cover and reduce heat to low.", "Cook for 10 minutes, or until fork can be inserted in chicken with ease.", "Remove chicken; drain off oil and discard.", "In same frying pan, add lime juice and cook over low heat until juice begins to bubble.", "Add butter, stirring until butter becomes opaque.", "Stir in chives and dill weed.", "Spoon over chicken.", "If chicken needs to be kept warm until meal is served, put back in pan with lime butter until ready to serve."]

Title: Bedtime Bars

Title: Shrimp Fettucine

Cook for 3 minutes, stirring constantly until cheese melts and sauce is smooth.", "Stir in salt and pepper.", "To serve, place warm fettucine in serving dish.", "Add shrimp mixture and toss gently to coat thoroughly.", "Makes 4 servings."]

Title: Nutty Shake

Title: Flying Fish Chowder

Title: English Toast

Title: Potato, Cucumber And Dill Salad

Title: Arcadia Park United Methodist Church'S Toasted Coconut Cake

Title: No Guilt Mud Pie

Title: Seafood Salad Dressing

Title: Refrigerator Sweet Rolls

Recipe: ["Add shortening and sugar to scalded milk; stir until dissolved.", "Pour cooled milk mixture into large mixing bowl to cool.", "Dissolve yeast and salt in water.", "When yeast mixture starts to froth, mix with milk mixture.", "Add beaten eggs to mixture and beat vigorously, using portable mixer or wooden spoon. Begin adding flour, one cup at a time, mixing until you have a stiff batter.", "Add a total of 6 cups of flour, one cup at a time until you have a stick batter.", "Place sticky dough on floured surface and knead in remaining flour or enough flour to make dough elastic and smooth.", "This process takes about 5 to 10 minutes. Title: Mom'S Refrigerator Relish

Title: Oreo Dessert

Recipe: ["Mix cookies and melted margarine well (by hand) and press into a 13 x 9-inch pan to make a crust (save 3/4 cup crumbs to sprinkle on top).", "Blend remaining ingredients; spread on top of crust and sprinkle remaining 3/4 cup cookie crumbs on top.", "Keep refrigerated."]

Title: Spinach Dip
Ingredients: ["10 oz. chopped spinach (frozen)", "1 c. mayonnaise", "1 c. sour cream", "1 small onion, chopped", "8 oz. water chestnuts, drained and minced", "1 envelope Knorr vegetable soup mix", "1 loaf Hawaiian bread or sourdough"]
Recipe: ["Thaw spinach.", "Press out all of the water.", "Add remaining ingredients to spinach and mix well.", "Refrigerate 2 hours before serving.", "Cut the top center portion out of the Hawaiian bread. Core loaf out.", "Spoon in the spinach dip before serving.", "Serve the dip with the cored out bread or crackers and fresh bite-size vegetables."]

Title: Lemon Icebox Pie

Recipe: ["Blend together milk, egg yolks and lemon juice.", "Pour into an 8-inch pie pan lined with an unbaked crumb crust, then cover with meringue or whipped cream.", "Put in refrigerator until chilled."]

Title: Granola

Recipe: ["Place oatmeal in mixing bowl.", "Add brown sugar.", "Add remaining ingredients and mix.", "Bake at 350 for 20 to 25 minutes, stirring often, crumble.", "Cover and keep in refrigerator."]

Title: Pie Crust

Recipe: ["Sift flour before measuring.", "Put ice cubes in cup of water before measuring.", "Spoon flour into measuring cup lightly.", "Level without shaking or packing down."]

Title: Tiny'S Slaw

Recipe: ["Grate cabbage and carrots.", "Mix vinegar and sugar and then combine with mayonnaise.", "Toss dressing with cabbage and carrots. Chill."]

Title: Sweet Nothings

Title: Granny'S Dumplings

Recipe: ["In large bowl mix boiling broth and Crisco and salt."]

Recipe: ["Cook carrots and celery in large Dutch oven or soup pot, covered for 10 minutes.", "Add potatoes; cook 10 minutes longer.", "Do not drain."]

Title: No-Bake Popcorn Cookies

Recipe: ["In a saucepan over hot water, melt caramels mixed with marshmallows and orange juice; cool, then add vanilla.", "Pour over popcorn and mix.", "Spoon", "onto aluminum foil and shape into 3-inch circles 1/2-inch thick.", "Nuts on top may be added."]

Title: Kendra'S Applesauce

Recipe: ["Steam apples in a steamer pan until soft and mushy.", "Then run apples through a sieve and add sugar and cinnamon to taste. Reserve liquid and run through a cheesecloth and there you have apple juice."]

Title: Strawberry Cake
Ingredients: ["1 pkg. white cake mix", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. strawberry Jell-O", "3/4 c. oil", "1 c. chopped pecans", "4 eggs", "2 Tbsp. flour", "10 oz. frozen strawberries", "1/2 c. sugar"]
Recipe: ["Grease Bundt pan.", "Combine ingredients.", "Beat with mixer 3 minutes.", "Bake 55 to 60 minutes.", "Ice when cool or serve with Cool Whip.", "It is moist and good."]

Title: Chocolate Clair Cake
Ingredients: ["1 (1 lb.) box graham crackers", "2 (3 oz.) boxes instant French vanilla pudding", "3 1/2 c. milk", "9 oz. container Cool Whip", "1 (15 oz.) ready to spread milk chocolate icing"]
Recipe: ["Line bottom of 9 x 13 pan with graham crackers. Mix pudding with milk. Beat 2 to 3 minutes on medium speed. Fold in Cool Whip. Pour 1/2 the mixture over the graham crackers. Layer the crackers and pudding, ending with graham crackers. Remove seal from icing and heat in microwave until soft. Pour over crackers and refrigerate overnight. The longer it sits, the better."]

Title: Crab Salad

Ingredients: ["2 c. rounded old bread, cut up into bite size pieces", "1/2 tsp. salt", "4 eggs, beaten", "2 c. evaporated milk", "1/2 c. sugar", "4 Tbsp. melted butter", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 tsp. cinnamon", "sprinkle of nutmeg", "raisins or coconut (if desired)"]
Recipe: ["Put cut up bread in 8-inch square greased pan.", "Mix eggs, salt, milk, sugar, butter and vanilla.", "Pour over bread pieces. Sprinkle with spices.", "Add raisins or coconut before liquids. Serve warm."]

Title: Swiss Christmas Trees
Ingredients: ["1 1/4 c. strained honey", "3/4 c. shortening", "2 c. sugar", "1/4 c. fruit juice", "grated rind of 1 orange", "granted rind of 1 lemon", "2 c. unblanched almonds, chopped", "10 c. cake flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "2 tsp. nutmeg", "1 tsp. cloves", "4 tsp. baking powder"]
Recipe: ["Melt honey and shortening together over hot water.", "Add sugar and fruit juice and stir until dissolved.", "Add grated rinds of orange and lemon, chopped almonds and the dry ingredients (which have been sifted together).", "Chill in refrigerator."]

Ingredients: ["1 (8 qt.) pkg. powdered milk", "1 (6 oz.) Coffee-mate (3/4 c.)", "1 (1 lb.) box Nestle Quik", "1 c. powdered sugar"]
Recipe: ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Store in a tightly closed container.", "Mix 4 tablespoons of mix in one cup hot water."]

Title: Sesame Chicken Salad
Ingredients: ["8 c. romaine lettuce, torn up", "3/4 lb. chicken, cooked and shredded", "1/2 c. green onions in 1/8-inch slices", "1/2 c. celery", "2 tsp. toasted sesame seed", "2 Tbsp. toasted slivered almonds", "1/2 c. Sesame-Oil Dressing"]
Recipe: ["Combine lettuce, chicken,", "green onions, celery, sesame seed and almonds in a", "salad", "bowl.", "Toss", "with dressing until coated. Place on chilled salad plates and top with additional slivered almonds."]

Title: Peanut Butter Snack
Ingredients: ["12 saltine or graham crackers", "1 jar peanut butter", "1 pack mini marshmallows"]
Recipe: ["Take crackers and spread peanut butter on them.", "Then take marshmallows and put four to a cracker on it.", "Put in microwave until marshmallows are melted.", "(Great for kids' snacks.)"]

Title: Sausage And Tortellini Toss
Ingredients: ["16 oz. cheese filled tortellini", "3 c. broccoli flowerets", "1 lb. smoked sausage", "1/4 c. margarine", "3 Tbsp. cornstarch", "3 c. milk", "2 c. shredded processed Swiss cheese"]
Recipe: ["Boil tortellini 15 minutes. Cut sausage into bite-size pieces. Add broccoli and sausage to tortellini. Bring to boil again, reduce heat and simmer 10 minutes; drain. Melt margarine in microwave; add cornstarch, then milk. Cook until thickened. Fold in cheese, stirring until smooth. In a large casserole, combine tortellini and sauce; toss until well coated. Serve warm."]

Title: Nutty Chocolate Bananas

Title: Coconut Pie

Blend in milk gradually, then egg yolks.", "Add butter.", "Cook until thick.", "Remove from heat.", "Add almost all the coconut (leave a little to go over the meringue).", "Pour into 8-inch baked pie shell and cover with meringue and bits of coconut.", "Brown."]

Title: Oat Pancakes

Recipe: ["Combine first five ingredients.", "Make a well in the center. Combine last four ingredients; pour into the well and stir until moistened."]

Title: Pea Salad

Cheddar cheese, grated", "1/3 c. celery, diced", "1/4 c. onion, diced", "1/4 c. green pepper, diced", "1 Tbsp. red pepper, diced", "1 tsp. celery seed", "1/4 c. sweet pickles, diced", "1/3 c. parsley", "1 hard-boiled egg, diced", "4 Tbsp. salad dressing", "1 tsp. lemon juice", "1 tsp. prepared mustard"]
Recipe: ["Mix all except last 3 ingredients together, then mix last 3 ingredients; add to pea salad and mix well.", "(Peanuts are optional.)"]

Title: Lazy Peach Cobbler
Ingredients: ["1/2 c. margarine", "2 c. all-purpose flour", "1 c. white sugar", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1 (29 oz.) can sliced peaches, juice reserved"]
Recipe: ["Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Once oven reaches desired temperature, melt margarine in glass 9X13 inch baking pan. In a large bowl, combine flour, sugar and baking powder. Pour reserved peach juice into dry ingredients and stir until smooth. Remove glass pan from oven and pour batter into pan starting in center; batter will then spread itself over entire pan. Add peaches by placing them in center of pan; allow them to spread on their own. Bake cobbler in preheated oven for 20 to 25 minutes, or until brown on top. Do not overcook."]

Title: Biscuit Bears

Title: Touchdown Dip

Recipe: ["Cook ground beef. Mix cream of mushroom soup, chili, Ro-Tel tomatoes, onion and cheese together in crock-pot. Add ground beef. Let cook until hot. Serve with Tostitos chips."]

Title: Cucumber Sandwiches(English Tea Fixings)

Recipe: ["Note:", "It's necessary to \"sweat\" the cucumbers first to avoid soggy sandwiches."]

Title: Mock Raspberry Jam

Recipe: ["Combine tomatoes and sugar and boil gently, approximately 15 minutes, stirring often.", "Add jello and cook 10 minutes longer. Continue to stir.", "Pour into hot, sterilized jars.", "Process in boiling water or use paraffin wax on top."]

Title: Strawberry Tiffany Torte
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. vanilla wafer crumbs", "1/2 c. margarine, melted", "1 3/4 c. milk", "1 pkg. (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1 pkg. (3 3/4 oz.) instant vanilla pudding", "1 tsp. grated lemon rind", "1 qt. fresh strawberries, sliced", "1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip topping"]
Recipe: ["Combine wafer crumbs and margarine; reserve 1/2 cup of this mixture for topping.", "Press remaining crumb mixture onto the bottom of a greased 9 x 13-inch pan.", "To softened cream cheese gradually add 1/2 cup milk, mixing until well blended.", "Add pudding mix, remaining milk and lemon rind.", "Beat slowly, about 1 minute.", "Pour carefully over crust and then cover with sliced strawberries.", "Spread Cool Whip over the strawberries and top with remaining wafer crumbs.", "Chill several hours or overnight.", "Makes 12 to 15 servings."]

Title: Fried Cabbage Supreme

Recipe: ["Fry meat in a large pan.", "Add onion, garlic, potatoes and cabbage.", "Simmer until mixture turns light brown, stirring frequently.", "Pour in chicken broth.", "Add salt and pepper.", "Cover. Simmer until brown."]

Title: Heavenly Hash

Title: Italian Tomato Sauce(Serves 6)

Recipe: ["Fry onion, garlic and celery slowly in the oil about 5 minutes.", "Crush tomatoes.", "Add to paste and the onion, celery and garlic.", "Add all other ingredients and simmer in a heavy covered pan 1 hour.", "Then add the meat balls and simmer, covered, about 30 minutes longer.", "(Cooked mushrooms may be added last 15 minutes.) If sauce becomes too thick, add a little water."]

Title: Cranberry Salad

Title: Heavenly Hash
Ingredients: ["Cool Whip (8 oz.)", "Eagle Brand milk", "1/4 c. lemon juice", "1/2 c. coconut", "15 oz. can pineapple (crushed), drained", "1/2 c. nuts, chopped"]

Title: Sauce For Paper Thin Sliced Ham

Title: Oriental Seafood Stir-Fry
Ingredients: ["1 Tbsp. cooking oil", "1 pkg. Louis Kemp crab delights", "1 1/2 c. Oriental vegetables or 10 oz. pkg. frozen Oriental style vegetables", "1/2 tsp. garlic powder", "1/2 tsp. ground ginger", "2 Tbsp. low sodium soy sauce", "2 c. medium noodles (about 4 oz.)", "1/4 c. fresh or frozen chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "1 (10 1/2 oz.) can condensed cream of shrimp soup", "1/3 c. milk", "1 c. shredded sharp process American cheese (4 oz.)", "2 (4 1/2 oz.) cans shrimp, drained (1 3/4 c.)", "3/4 c. soft bread crumbs (1 slice)", "1 Tbsp. butter or margarine, melted"]
Recipe: ["Advance preparation:", "Cook noodles in boiling salted water until tender, but still firm, about 7 minutes.", "Drain noodles well. Meanwhile, in large saucepan, cook chopped green pepper in 2 tablespoons butter or margarine until tender.", "Stir in cream of shrimp soup and milk; heat, stirring constantly until bubbly.", "Add shredded cheese; stir until melted.", "Stir in drained shrimp and drained noodles.", "Turn into 1 1/2-quart casserole.", "Cover. Title: *Lemon Sauce
Ingredients: ["1/2 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/8 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. nutmeg (optional)", "1 c. boiling water", "2 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "1 1/2 Tbsp. lemon juice", "grated rind of 1 lemon"]
Recipe: ["Blend sugar, cornstarch, salt and nutmeg.", "Gradually add boiling water, stirring constantly, and cook over low heat for 5 minutes or until thick and clear.", "Add butter or margarine, lemon juice and lemon.", "Makes 1 1/2 cups."]

Title: Potato Casserole
Ingredients: ["1 pkg. Hash Browns", "1 can Cream of Chicken Soup", "1 16 oz. Sour Cream", "1/4 c. Onion-chopped", "1/2 stick Butter", "Salt and Pepper", "1 pkg. (2 cups) shredded Mild Cheddar Cheese", "3/4 c. Milk"]
Recipe: ["Combine potatoes, onion, 1 cup cheddar cheese, sour cream, soup and salt and pepper in a large pot on the stove. In a casserole dish melt butter and place mixture in dish. Add remaining cheese and milk. Bake @ 350 degrees for 1 hr."]

Title: Angel Lime Dessert
Ingredients: ["9-inch tube angel cake", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/3 c. lime juice", "1 c. whipping cream, whipped", "5 oz. pkg. lime flavored jello", "1 1/3 c. boiling water", "few drops green food coloring", "3 1/2 oz. can flaked coconut (1 1/3 c.)"]
Recipe: ["Trim brown crumbs from cake and tear into bite-size pieces or cut into cubes.", "Dissolve jello and sugar in boiling water.", "Add lime juice and food coloring; chill until partially thickened. Fold in whipped cream and coconut.", "Place half the cake in 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan.", "Pour half of gelatin mixture over; repeat layers.", "Chill several hours or overnight.", "Cut in squares.", "Recipe from Hills and Pines Garden Club, Raleigh, North Carolina."]

Title: Bread And Butter Pickles
Ingredients: ["4 qt. or more sliced cucumbers", "1/3 c. salt", "5 c. sugar", "1 1/2 tsp. turmeric", "1 1/2 tsp. celery seed", "2 Tbsp. mustard seed", "3 c. vinegar"]
Recipe: ["Slice cukes thin.", "Add salt; cover with crushed ice.", "Let set 15 minutes or until ice melts.", "Combine remaining ingredients. Drain cucumbers.", "Put cukes into mixture and bring to boil.", "Seal in hot sterilized jars.", "Makes 6 to 8 pints."]

Title: Shrimp Newburg
Ingredients: ["6 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. light cream", "1 c. milk", "4 slightly beaten egg yolks", "1 lb. shelled cooked shrimp", "1/4 c. cooking sherry", "2 tsp. lemon juice", "toast, cut diagonally"]
Recipe: ["In a skillet or blazer pan of chafing dish, melt the butter. Blend in flour and salt.", "Stir in cream and milk; cook, stirring constantly, until sauce thickens and bubbles.", "Reduce heat of skillet.", "Stir small amounts of sauce into egg yolks until completely blended.", "Return to skillet and cook, stirring constantly.", "About 1 minute after returning to skillet, add shrimp, wine and lemon juice; heat thoroughly.", "Serve over toast.", "Serves 5 to 6."]

Title: Autumn Tossed Salad
Ingredients: ["1 head lettuce, broken into bite-size pieces", "3 tart apples (unpeeled), cored and sliced into wedges", "1 small red onion, sliced into rings", "2 oz. Blue cheese (more if desired)", "1/2 c. Good Seasons Italian dressing, prepared"]
Recipe: ["In large salad bowl pour 1/4 cup of salad dressing and 1/2 of the Blue cheese.", "Mash Blue cheese into dressing; blend until smooth.", "Add lettuce, apple slices and onion.", "Crumble remaining Blue cheese on top."]

Title: Smothered Okra
Ingredients: ["3 lb. okra", "1 medium chopped onion", "1/4 c. cooking oil", "2 small cans (8 oz.) tomato sauce", "2 Tbsp. salt"]
Recipe: ["Wash and slice okra thin.", "Put in large stainless steel pot that you have already poured cooking oil into.", "Add tomato sauce and salt; cook on low fire, stirring often.", "Cover pot between stirrings.", "Cook on low fire about 45 minutes, stirring often."]

Title: English Pot Roast(Crock Pot)
Ingredients: ["1 3 lb. beef chuck roast", "1 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "2 onions, cut in quarters", "1 stalk celery, cut in eight pieces", "1 bay leaf", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "5 c. water", "1 small head of cabbage"]
Recipe: ["Place onion and celery in bottom of pot. Put the roast on top of these. Put salt, pepper and vinegar on the meat and add bay leaf and 5 cups water. Cook 5 to 7 hours. Remove meat. Add cabbage and cook on", "high until cabbage is done."]

Title: New Jersey Fried Chicken
Ingredients: ["1 chicken fryer or legs and wings", "garlic powder", "seasoned salt (Lawry's)", "oil", "2 tsp. butter", "flour"]
Recipe: ["Wash and drain chicken.", "Mix all dry ingredients together in bag and shake.", "Pour oil in deep frying pan and heat to very hot. Put chicken in bag and coat well.", "Place in hot oil.", "Put in butter; cover and let fry until golden brown and tender.", "Serve with rice and vegetable.", "Makes about 4 servings."]

Title: Mexican Cheese Dip
Ingredients: ["1/2 stick butter", "4 Tbsp. flour", "1 heaping tsp. paprika", "1/2 tsp. ground mustard", "1 tsp. chili powder", "1 Tbsp. catsup", "1 tsp. pepper sauce", "1 tsp. ground cumin", "2 c. milk", "1 tsp. chopped peppers", "8 oz. grated processed cheese", "1 clove garlic, chopped"]
Recipe: ["Melt butter; add flour and cook for 1 minute.", "Add paprika, mustard, chili powder, catsup, pepper sauce and cumin.", "Stir well. Add remaining ingredients.", "Cook over low heat until thick, stirring constantly to keep from sticking."]

Title: Fruit Salad
Ingredients: ["1 (20 oz.) can pineapple chunks and juice", "1 small box vanilla instant pudding", "1 Tbsp. Tang", "1 lb. can pears", "1 lb. can peaches", "1 lb. can fruit cocktail", "2 red apples", "2 yellow apples", "2 bananas", "2 to 3 kiwi", "red and white seedless grapes"]
Recipe: ["Mix Tang, pudding and pineapple chunks together.", "Cut all other fruits into bite size pieces.", "Refrigerate all fruits, except bananas, overnight before using.", "Make this 1 to 2 hours before serving.", "Yields 36 cups."]

Title: Hot Dog Chili
Ingredients: ["1 lb. ground beef", "1 onion, diced", "1 can tomato sauce", "2 to 3 c. water", "1/2 c. catsup", "1 tsp. vinegar", "1 1/2 tsp. chili powder", "1 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. brown sugar"]
Recipe: ["Combine all ingredients.", "Cook slowly for 1 1/2 hours."]

Title: Butterscotch Dessert
Ingredients: ["Ritz crackers", "4 Tbsp. sugar", "1/2 c. walnuts (optional)", "1 stick melted margarine", "8 oz. cream cheese, softened", "1 c. 10x sugar", "Cool Whip", "2 pkg. instant butterscotch pudding", "3 c. milk", "Bits 'O Brickle (Weis)"]
Recipe: ["Crust:", "Mix and grind 50 Ritz crackers, 4 tablespoons sugar, walnuts and melted margarine.", "Pat into a 9 x 13-inch pan and refrigerate."]

Title: Broccoli Salad
Ingredients: ["1/3 c. oil and vinegar dressing (I use Italian)", "1 to 2 stalks fresh broccoli, cut in pieces", "1 medium tomato, diced or cherry tomatoes", "1/4 c. diced Cheddar cheese", "2 Tbsp. minced onion", "2 to 3 Tbsp. chopped nuts, toasted"]
Recipe: ["Combine all ingredients except nuts.", "Cover and refrigerate 2 hours.", "Before serving, toss in nuts."]

Title: Fruit Dip
Ingredients: ["1 c. marshmallow cream", "1 c. (8 oz.) softened cream cheese", "3 or 4 maraschino cherries, chopped", "1 Tbsp. maraschino cherry juice"]
Recipe: ["Beat together marshmallow cream and cream cheese until light and fluffy.", "Add cherries and juice and beat another 1 or 2 minutes.", "Cover and chill overnight or 3 to 4 hours."]

Title: Jello Jigglers
Ingredients: ["2 large pkg. Jell-O", "2 1/2 c. boiling water (do not add cold water)"]

Title: Hot German Potato Salad
