Title: Heavenly Hamburger
Ingredients: ["1 lb. hamburger", "2 small cans (8 oz.) tomato sauce", "1 small onion, chopped", "1 pt. sour cream", "3 or 4 oz. cream cheese", "Green onions, chopped (number to taste)", "1/2 bag egg noodles", "Cheddar cheese, grated"]
Recipe: ["Brown meat and onion, add tomato sauce and simmer for 30 minutes. Cook noodles and drain. Combine sour cream, green onions and cream cheese. Layer in ungreased casserole dish: noodles, meat, cream mixture ending with noodles on top. Sprinkle grated cheese over top. Bake in 350 degree oven for 30 minutes."]

Title: Moussaka
Ingredients: ["3 Tbsp. butter", "1 large onion", "salt and pepper to taste", "1 1/2 lb. ground meat (beef or lamb)", "1 clove garlic", "1 c. tomato puree", "1/2 c. cold water", "1/4 tsp. nutmeg", "1/2 c. grated cheese", "1/2 c. salad oil", "1 c. flour", "2 medium eggplant, cut into 1/2 inch lengthwise"]
Recipe: ["Cook onion in butter with salt and pepper for 5 minutes.", "Add meat and garlic; cook 10 minutes.", "Add puree, water and nutmeg; cook 10 minutes.", "Coat eggplant with flour seasoned with salt and pepper.", "Fry in hot oil.", "Place 1/2 of eggplant in baking dish and cover with 1/2 meat mixture.", "Repeat layers and top with cheese. Bake at 350 degrees until hot."]

Title: Clam Bake
Ingredients: ["4 ears corn", "4 chicken quarters", "4 potatoes, quartered", "4 onions, quartered", "2 stalks celery, cut", "1 lb. smoked sausage, cut in chunks", "1 doz. steaming clams"]
Recipe: ["Cover bottom of large pot with 1-inch of water.", "Put in rack. Layer corn, chicken, potatoes, onions and celery.", "Put sausage on top.", "Cover with aluminum foil with holes punched in it.", "Add clams.", "Bring to full steaming boil.", "Reduce heat to medium.", "Cook 45 minutes.", "Serves 4."]

Title: Refrigerator Rolls
Ingredients: ["1/2 c. milk", "2 Tbsp. Crisco", "1/2 c. ice water", "1/2 c. warm water", "flour", "1 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 yeast cake"]
Recipe: ["Scald 1/2 cup milk and 2 tablespoons Crisco.", "Take off stove and add ice water.", "Add yeast cake to warm water.", "Mix with flour, salt and sugar, sifted together.", "Make soft dough; roll out and let rise for 1 hour."]

Title: Mexican Chicken
Ingredients: ["4 chicken breast halves, cubed", "1 Tbsp. olive oil", "2 zucchini, sliced", "1 (14 1/2 oz.) can Mexican style stewed tomatoes", "1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce", "1 (4 oz.) can diced green chiles", "1/2 tsp. cumin", "1 tsp. garlic powder"]
Recipe: ["Brown chicken in oil in a large skillet for 8 to 10 minutes. Wipe up excess oil with paper towel.", "Combine cumin and garlic with tomato sauce and pour over chicken, then add remaining ingredients. Cook and simmer, covered, 8 to 10 minutes.", "Uncover and cook on high 8 to 10 minutes.", "Serve over cooked rice."]

Title: Apricot Salad
Ingredients: ["2 boxes apricot Jell-O", "2 cans crushed pineapple", "1 can mandarin oranges", "1 (8 oz.) Philadelphia cream cheese"]
Recipe: ["Dissolve Jell-O in 2 cups boiling water; drain juice from fruit and add enough water for 2 cups.", "Add cheese while it's hot. Heat until dissolved, then add fruit.", "Refrigerate."]

Title: Clam Dip
Ingredients: ["1 clove garlic", "2 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 tsp. lemon juice", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 1/2 c. clams, minced", "1 Tbsp. clam broth", "potato chips"]
Recipe: ["Rub inside of small bowl with cut clove of garlic.", "Blend cream cheese with seasonings.", "Add clams which have been drained and chopped.", "Add clam juice.", "Put in a bowl and chill."]

Title: Crock-Pot Barbecue
Ingredients: ["3 or 4 lb. roast", "2 onions, chopped and divided", "1 c. water", "16 oz. barbecue sauce"]
Recipe: ["Cut roast into 1 or 2-inch cubes and put into crock-pot with 1 chopped onion and water. Cook on low overnight (10 to 12 hours). After cooking, drain off liquid. Remove all fat and bones. Break up the lean meat with fingers and return to pot with 1 chopped onion and barbecue sauce.", "Cook on low for another 5 to 6 hours."]

Title: "A" Quickie
Ingredients: ["1 lb. bulk sausage", "1 (No. 2) can cream-style corn", "2 eggs", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. chopped green pepper", "1 c. breadcrumbs", "2 Tbsp. butter or margarine"]
Recipe: ["Brown sausage until crumbly, stirring occasionally to break it up.", "While it is frying, combine corn and eggs (slightly beaten). Season with salt and green pepper."]

Title: Cornflake Candy
Ingredients: ["1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. Karo", "2/3 c. peanut butter", "3 c. cornflakes"]
Recipe: ["Cook sugar and Karo to good boil.", "Immediately remove from heat and stir in peanut butter.", "Pour over cornflakes and drop on wax paper.", "Do not overcook.", "It takes approximately 2 minutes."]

Title: Spaghetti Pie
Ingredients: ["6 oz. spaghetti noodles", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1/2 c. Parmesan cheese", "2 beaten eggs", "1 lb. ground beef", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1 (8 oz.) can tomatoes, cut up", "1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste", "1 tsp. sugar", "1 tsp. oregano", "1 tsp. garlic salt", "1/2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese", "1 c. (8 oz.) cottage cheese"]
Recipe: ["Cook spaghetti according to package directions.", "Stir in butter, Parmesan cheese and eggs.", "Form spaghetti mixture into a crust in a buttered 10-inch pie pan.", "Spread cottage cheese over this."]

Title: Meat And Potato Pie
Ingredients: ["pastry for 9-inch pie (double)", "1 lb. ground beef", "1 medium onion", "2 c. coarsely grated potatoes", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "3 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/4 c. water", "1 1/2 c. beef broth"]
Recipe: ["Roll pastry to fit 9-inch pie pan.", "Brown beef and onion in a large skillet; cook until meat is brown.", "Drain off drippings. Add potatoes, broth, salt and pepper.", "Cover and simmer 15 minutes or until potatoes are tender."]

Title: Kentucky Bourbon Balls
Ingredients: ["1/4 lb. (1 stick) sweet butter", "1 lb. box confectioners sugar", "pinch of salt", "1/2 c. bourbon (I use Canadian Club whiskey)", "1/2 c. pecans, finely chopped", "sweetened cocoa or melted chocolate (for dipping)"]
Recipe: ["In the mixing bowl of an electric mixer, beat the butter to soften, then gradually and thoroughly beat in the sugar and salt. Very slowly, so the mixture doesn't curdle, beat in the bourbon in a steady stream. Beat in the minced pecans and mix well. Cover and refrigerate 1 to 2 hours until firm."]

Title: Sweet Basil Carrots
Ingredients: ["12 medium carrots, peeled", "3 Tbsp. butter", "2 Tbsp. pure maple syrup", "1 to 2 tsp. fresh basil", "1/4 tsp. salt"]
Recipe: ["Cut carrots into 1/8-inch slices or run through slicer of food processor.", "Place them in vegetable steamer, covered, over boiling water for 10 minutes until tender, but not mushy. Remove from heat and set aside. Carrots may be steamed well in advance and combined with other ingredients immediately before serving.", "In a large, heavy saucepan, melt butter.", "Add maple syrup, carrots, basil and salt.", "Stir well to coat carrots thoroughly with butter sauce. Serves 4 to 6."]

Title: Breakfast Casserole
Ingredients: ["8-12 slices of bread (no crust)", "1 1/2 lb. ham (chopped)", "1 medium onion (chopped)", "4 eggs", "1 can cream of mushroom soup (undiluted)", "1 1/2 c. milk"]
Recipe: ["In a 12 x 12 glass baking dish grease bottom then layer slices of bread on bottom- cut off all crust.", "Put ham, cheddar cheese and chopped onion on top of bread.", "In another bowl beat 4 eggs, add cream of mushroom soup, milk and mix together.", "Pour over top - set in.", "Refrigerate overnight.", "In the morning bake at 300 degrees for 1 hour."]

Title: Russian Tea
Ingredients: ["26 oz. Tang", "5 oz. unsweetened tea (instant)", "1 pkg. lemonade unsweetened Kool-Aid", "1 tsp. cloves", "1 Tbsp. cinnamon", "1 1/2 c. sugar"]
Recipe: ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Store in container.", "Put 2 teaspoons to a cup", "of boiling water.", "Stir with spoon, then drink."]

Title: Mary Lou'S Easy Caesar Salad
Ingredients: ["1 raw egg", "2/3 c. olive oil", "2 to 3 Tbsp. vinegar", "2 cloves garlic, chopped", "1/2 tsp. sugar", "1 green onion, chopped", "1/2 tsp. mustard", "1/2 tsp. celery salt", "3 to 4 inches anchovy paste", "3 Tbsp. parsley, chopped", "1/2 c. Parmesan cheese"]
Recipe: ["Mix egg, oil, vinegar, salt, pepper, sugar, parsley, garlic, onion, mustard and celery salt in blender, then add anchovy paste and parsley flakes.", "Then add Parmesan cheese.", "If mixture is too thin, add another egg and more cheese to make thick and creamy. Put dressing in refrigerator to chill until ready to serve."]

Title: White Fudge
Ingredients: ["2 sticks butter", "3 (10 oz.) pkg. white chocolate chips", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 (8 oz.) jar marshmallow cream", "4 1/2 c. sugar", "1 can evaporated milk"]
Recipe: ["In large bowl, mix marshmallow cream, butter and chips; set aside.", "In saucepan, cook sugar and milk on medium heat, stirring constantly.", "Bring to boil and continue boiling and stirring for 9 minutes.", "Pour over ingredients in bowl; add vanilla.", "Stir very well until creamy.", "Pour into greased 10 x 15-inch pans.", "Makes 2 large Pyrex pans."]

Title: Sauteed Mushrooms
Ingredients: ["8 oz. fresh mushrooms", "1 c. butter", "1 Tbsp. garlic powder", "1 large onion", "1 large green pepper"]
Recipe: ["Slice and clean mushrooms.", "Put butter in a pan and bring to a slow simmer.", "Add mushrooms, sliced onion and green pepper.", "Cover and stir occasionally.", "Let cook about 15 or 20 minutes."]

Title: Grape Leaf Pickles
Ingredients: ["1/2 c. salt", "1 c. vinegar", "4 c. water", "1/2 grape leaf in qt. jar"]
Recipe: ["Wash pickles.", "Place in 1 quart jar; cover with boiling vinegar mixture and seal.", "Good after 9 days."]

Title: Tuna Salad
Ingredients: ["2 (6 1/2 oz.) cans tuna, drained", "1 c. finely chopped celery", "1/4 c. finely chopped onion", "1/2 c. chopped apple", "1/4 c. chopped sweet pickle", "2 hard-boiled eggs, chopped", "1/2 c. or more mayonnaise", "1/2 tsp. lemon pepper seasoning"]
Recipe: ["Mix all ingredients together and serve on lettuce."]

Title: Cheese Ball
Ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese", "1 to 2 Tbsp. chopped green pepper", "1 Tbsp. finely chopped pimento", "1 Tbsp. finely chopped onions", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 Tbsp. lemon juice"]
Recipe: ["Soften cream cheese with Worcestershire sauce and lemon juice. Add remaining ingredients; mix well.", "Chill!", "Shape into ball or log.", "Roll in chopped or ground pecans."]

Title: Swedish Tea Rings
Ingredients: ["1/4 c. brown sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1/2 c. butter", "1 c. flour"]
Recipe: ["Roll in balls and dip each in white of egg; roll in nuts. Bake 5 minutes.", "Take thimble and put hole in each.", "Bake 10 minutes longer.", "Fill with frosting or jam.", "Makes 14."]

Title: Easy As Pie
Ingredients: ["4 medium apples (4 c.)", "1 1/2 c. water", "1/4 tsp. cinnamon", "1/4 tsp. nutmeg", "1 Tbsp. butter", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. peach jello", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. instant vanilla pudding", "1 baked pie shell"]
Recipe: ["Combine apples, water, spices and butter.", "Bring to a boil and reduce heat.", "Simmer 5 minutes.", "Stir in jello, then pudding.", "Mix well.", "Bring to a boil over high heat.", "Remove and let stand 5 minutes.", "Pour into pie shell.", "Chill 3 to 4 hours."]

Title: Perfect White Bread
Ingredients: ["1 pkg. active dry yeast", "5 3/4 to 6 1/2 c. flour", "2 1/4 c. milk", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 Tbsp. shortening", "2 tsp. salt"]
Recipe: ["In large mixer bowl, combine yeast and 2 1/2 cups flour.", "Heat milk, sugar, shortening and salt, stirring constantly, to almost melt shortening. Add to dry mixture in bowl. Beat at low speed for 1/2 minute, scraping sides of bowl constantly. Beat 3 minutes at high speed. By hand, stir in enough of the remaining flour to make a moderately stiff dough. Turn out onto lightly floured surface. Knead until smooth and satiny (8 to 10 minutes). Shape into ball. Place in lightly greased bowl, turning once to grease surface. Cover and let rise in warm place until double, about 75 minutes."]

Title: Streusel Banana Muffins
Ingredients: ["1/4 c. brown sugar", "1/4 c. chopped nuts", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1 c. mashed bananas", "1/2 c. oil", "1/3 c. milk", "1 egg", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour", "1/2 c. sugar", "3 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. salt", "1/3 c. chopped nuts (optional)"]
Recipe: ["For streusel, mix brown sugar, 1/4 c. chopped nuts and cinnamon; set aside.", "In separate bowl, mix flour, sugar, baking powder, salt and 1/3 c. chopped nuts; set aside.", "In third bowl, beat bananas, oil, milk, egg and vanilla.", "Add flour mixture all at once, stirring with spoon, until flour is just moistened. Batter will be lumpy.", "Divide batter evenly among muffin cups. Sprinkle with streusel mix.", "Bake at 400 degrees approximately 15 minutes, or until toothpick comes out clean.", "Remove immediately and cool."]

Title: Olive Deviled Eggs
Ingredients: ["2 doz. eggs, hard-cooked", "2/3 c. mayonnaise", "1/4 c. minced pimiento-stuffed green olives", "1 tsp. oregano", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. black pepper", "1/4 tsp. garlic powder", "lettuce leaves"]
Recipe: ["Day before serving or early in day, cut eggs in half lengthwise.", "Remove yolks to small mixing bowl; mash.", "Add remaining ingredients.", "Mix well.", "Fill whites with yolk mixture, cover and refrigerate.", "Just before serving place eggs on lettuce lined platter."]

Title: Marinated London Broil
Ingredients: ["2 cloves garlic", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "1 tsp. salt", "dash of cayenne", "1 c. corn oil", "2 tsp. dry mustard", "2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "few drops Tabasco sauce"]
Recipe: ["Slice garlic into large shallow pan.", "Add remaining ingredients; stir until blended.", "Place steak in pan and pour sauce over it.", "Let stand at least 3 hours or overnight.", "Grill."]

Title: Pilgrim Stuffing
Ingredients: ["1 c. heavy cream", "2 egg yolks", "1 Tbsp. honey", "pinch of saffron (if wanted)", "1/2 tsp. cinnamon", "1/4 tsp. mace", "1/4 tsp. nutmeg", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 1/4 c. fine bread crumbs", "1 c. raisins or currants"]
Recipe: ["Beat cream, egg yolks and saffron, stirring constantly with a fork.", "Stir in spices and salt. Add the bread crumbs.", "Mix well. Stir in the raisins or currants. Bake."]

Title: Super-Duper French Toast(Brunch)
Ingredients: ["6 eggs", "2/3 c. orange juice", "1/3 c. Grand Marnier or any orange liqueur", "1/3 c. milk", "3 Tbsp. sugar", "1/4 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. finely grated orange peel", "8 (3/4 inch thick) slices French bread"]
Recipe: ["Mix ingredients together and pour over bread slices laid out flat in large pan.", "Let set overnight in refrigerator.", "Cook in butter on grill and serve with powdered sugar or syrup."]

Title: Crawfish Bisque
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. crawfish tails", "5 medium onions, minced", "3 stalks celery, minced", "4 medium bell peppers, minced", "4 cloves garlic, minced", "6 slices stale bread", "cooking oil", "black pepper", "red pepper", "salt"]
Recipe: ["Combine minced vegetables and brown well in enough cooking oil to barely cover.", "Pour off excess oil when vegetables are browned. Grind crawfish tails.", "Soak bread in water and wring out water."]

Title: Easy No Knead Yeast Rolls
Ingredients: ["1 pkg. dry yeast", "1 c. warm water", "2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. butter flavor Crisco", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 egg", "3 c. unsifted all-purpose flour"]
Recipe: ["Dissolve yeast in barely warm water and set aside.", "Cream next 3 ingredients with a fork.", "Add egg and cream again.", "Add dissolved yeast to this mixture.", "Then add flour and mix until all blended.", "Pat in a small ball in the mixing bowl.", "Put a little oil on the mixing bowl sides and turn dough to coat.", "Put a cloth over bowl and let rise to double thickness (about 2 hours)."]

Title: Danish Pastry With Cream Puff Topping
Ingredients: ["1 c. flour", "2 Tbsp. water", "1/2 c. margarine or butter"]
Recipe: ["Cut butter into flour as for pie crust.", "Add water to make a soft dough.", "Divide into 2 strips 12/2 on an ungreased cookie sheet."]

Title: Lemon-Lime Refrigerator Sheet Cake
Ingredients: ["1 pkg. Duncan Hines lemon supreme cake mix", "1 (4 serving size) pkg. lime gelatin", "1 envelope whipped topping mix (2 to 2 1/2 c. yield)", "1 (4 serving size) pkg. lemon instant pudding mix", "1 1/2 c. cold milk"]
Recipe: ["Dissolve gelatins in 3/4 cup boiling water.", "Add 1/2 cup cold water; set aside.", "Mix and bake cake as directed in a 13 x 9 x 2-inch pan.", "Cool 20 to 25 minutes.", "Poke deep holes about 1 inch apart in cake (still in pan) with a meat fork.", "Pour gelatin mixture into holes.", "Refrigerate cake."]

Title: Pull-Apart Parmesan Garlic Bubble Loaf
Ingredients: ["1 (1 lb.) loaf frozen bread dough, thawed", "3 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese", "1/2 tsp. garlic powder", "1/4 c. butter or margarine, melted"]
Recipe: ["Cut dough in 16 equal pieces.", "Shape in balls.", "Place on floured surface; cover.", "Let rest 10 minutes.", "Stir Parmesan and garlic powder into melted butter, using spoon.", "Roll balls in butter mixture."]

Title: Seafood Salad
Ingredients: ["4 oz. fine egg noodles", "1/2 c. sour cream", "1/2 c. plain yogurt", "1 1/2 Tbsp. lemon juice", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 (16 oz.) pkg. frozen seafood mix, thawed", "1/2 c. chopped celery", "1 1/2 Tbsp. minced onion", "2 tsp. dried parsley flakes", "2 tsp. freeze-dried chives", "1/4 tsp. seasoned salt", "leaf lettuce"]
Recipe: ["Cook egg noodles according to package directions; drain. Rinse with cold water; drain.", "Set aside.", "Combine sour cream and next 3 ingredients, mixing well.", "Combine noodles, sour cream mixture, seafood mix and next 6 ingredients, mixing well.", "Chill 8 hours.", "Arrange on lettuce-lined plates.", "Garnish, if desired. Garnish: tomato wedges, parsley sprigs."]

Title: Frying Pan Shrimp Scampi
Ingredients: ["1 lb. shrimp (medium)", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/3 tsp. basil", "1/4 c. butter or margarine", "2 Tbsp. minced garlic", "1/2 tsp. oregano", "1/4 c. select olive oil"]
Recipe: ["De-shell shrimp and butterfly.", "Dry thoroughly.", "Heat ingredients in frying pan and when very hot, add shrimp.", "Stir constantly, cooking for 2 to 2 1/2 minutes.", "Serve with French roll and wine."]

Title: Wild Rice And Chicken Bake
Ingredients: ["1 (6 1/4 oz.) pkg. quick-cooking long grain and wild rice", "1 1/2 c. water", "1 (10 3/4 oz.) can reduced sodium condensed cream of mushroom soup", "1 (8 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts, drained", "3/4 c. frozen peas", "1 medium carrot, shredded", "3 whole medium chicken breasts (about 2 lb. total), skinned, boned and halved lengthwise", "1/8 tsp. paprika", "1/8 tsp. pepper"]
Recipe: ["Place uncooked rice and half of the flavor packet (about 1 1/2 tablespoons) in a 3-quart rectangular baking dish.", "Stir in water, soup, water chestnuts, frozen peas and carrot.", "Arrange chicken over rice.", "Sprinkle chicken with paprika and pepper."]

Title: Lazy Peach Pie
Ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1 c. flour", "2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "3/4 c. milk", "1 large can sliced peaches", "1/2 c. butter or margarine"]
Recipe: ["Melt 1/2 cup butter or margarine in oblong cake pan.", "Sift together sugar, flour, baking powder and salt.", "Mix 3/4 cup milk with dry ingredients.", "Pour over melted butter in cake pan."]

Title: Layered Tacos
Ingredients: ["tortilla chips", "refried beans", "8 oz. sour cream", "lettuce, chopped", "tomato, chopped", "onion, chopped", "black olives, sliced", "taco sauce", "cheese, shredded"]
Recipe: ["Layer in order on tray.", "Refrigerate until ready to use."]

Title: Guava Jello
Ingredients: ["2 3/4 c. water", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 box strawberry jello", "3 pkg. Knox gelatine", "1 can frozen guava juice"]
Recipe: ["Boil 2 cups of water.", "Add sugar to boiling water and stir until sugar dissolves; add jello.", "In another bowl, melt gelatine in 3/4 cup cold water.", "Pour jello mixture into gelatine mixture and add guava juice.", "Pour into 8 x 8-inch pan and refrigerate overnight.", "Cut and serve."]

Title: Chicken Frangelica
Ingredients: ["4 (5 oz.) boneless chicken breasts", "1 1/2 oz. Frangelica liqueur", "1 oz. brandy", "4 oz. heavy cream", "1/4 c. mushrooms", "1/2 Tbsp. shallots"]
Recipe: ["Saute chicken breasts.", "Add Frangelica and brandy.", "Slowly stir in cream.", "Add mushrooms and shallots.", "Simmer slowly for 10 minutes.", "Rice pilaf makes a nice accompaniment to this dish. Also, stir-fried, julienned, fresh vegetables."]

Title: Sweet Potato Biscuits
Ingredients: ["3 c. self-rising flour", "6 Tbsp. lard", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/3 to 1/2 c. milk", "1 c. cooked sweet potatoes, mashed"]
Recipe: ["This was made in the bread tray like regular biscuits, but a regular bowl may be used."]

Title: Jezebel Sauce
Ingredients: ["1 (10 oz.) jar apple jelly", "1 (10 oz.) jar pineapple preserves", "1 (5 oz.) jar pure horseradish"]
Recipe: ["Mix all ingredients together and refrigerate.", "Serve with meat."]

Title: Microwave Rice
Ingredients: ["1 c. rice", "2 c. water", "salt to taste"]
Recipe: ["Combine rice and water in Pyrex bowl. Cover.", "Microwave 5 minutes", "on", "High.", "Reduce", "to", "medium heat and microwave 13 minutes.", "Let set for 5 minutes."]

Title: Aunt Dianne'S Beef Stroganoff
Ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. margarine", "1 lb. round steak, cut into 1/4-inch strips", "1/2 c. thinly sliced onion", "1 can mushroom soup", "1/2 c. commercial sour cream", "1/3 c. water (more if needed)"]
Recipe: ["Heat margarine in large skillet over moderately high heat. Add meat and onion; cook until meat is brown and onion is tender. Remove from heat.", "Add soup, sour cream and water.", "Stir and place over moderately low heat for about an hour, or until meat is fork-tender.", "Serve over cooked, lightly buttered noodles or rice."]

Title: Lemon Tamari Salad Dressing
Ingredients: ["1/2 medium yellow onion", "1 small green pepper", "2 stalks celery", "1 tsp. white pepper", "1 tsp. garlic powder", "1 c. tahini (sesame paste)", "3/4 c. fresh lemon juice", "1/2 c. soy oil", "1 c. sesame oil (light colored, not oriental dark colored)", "3/4 c. tamari", "1 Tbsp. honey"]
Recipe: ["Combine all ingredients in blender or food processor.", "Blend until smooth.", "Makes 1 quart.", "Will keep in refrigerator about 4 weeks."]

Title: Tossed Broccoli Salad
Ingredients: ["2 lbs. fresh broccoli, trimmed & cut into 1 inch pieces", "1/2 lb. bacon, fried & crumbled", "2 c. (8 oz.) finely shredded Mozzarella cheese", "1/2 red onion, chopped"]
Recipe: ["In a large bowl, combine broccoli, bacon, onion & cheese.", "In a separate bowl, combine all dressing ingredients."]

Title: Glazed Fruit
Ingredients: ["1 (11 oz.) can mandarin oranges", "1 (20 oz.) can chunk pineapple", "1 (3 3/4 oz.) pkg. vanilla instant pudding", "2 bananas, sliced", "1 tsp. rum flavoring (optional)"]
Recipe: ["Drain all fruit. Reserve pineapple juice. Mix pudding, pineapple juice and rum flavoring. Mix in fruits and chill. Add bananas at serving time."]

Title: Deep Dish Salad
Ingredients: ["1 head lettuce, shredded", "2 medium red onions, sliced", "1 to 2 green peppers, sliced", "3 to 4 ribs celery, chopped", "8 oz. water chestnuts, sliced", "10 oz. frozen green peas, uncooked", "2 c. Hellmann's mayonnaise", "Romano cheese or Parmesan cheese", "3 eggs, hard-boiled", "4 strips bacon, crumbled", "1 to 2 tomatoes, sliced"]
Recipe: ["Layer first 6 ingredients in serving bowl in order, beginning with lettuce.", "Spread mayonnaise over top layer; sprinkle with cheese.", "Do not stir!", "Cover and refrigerate for 24 hours. Forty-five minutes before serving, remove from refrigerator and garnish with sliced eggs, bacon and tomatoes.", "Serves 12 to 14."]

Title: Buckeyes
Ingredients: ["5 C. powdered sugar", "1 C. peanut butter", "2 sticks margarine", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 - 12 oz. pkg. chocolate chips", "1/8 lb. paraffin"]
Recipe: ["Work together the first four ingredients with hands. Roll into 1/2 inch balls. Let stand in refrigerator overnight.", "In double boiler, melt chocolate chips and paraffin. Put a toothpick into ball and dip into melted chocolate. Leave top open so it looks like a buckeye."]

Title: Original Coney Island Sauce
Ingredients: ["1 Tbsp. shortening", "2 medium onions", "1/2 tsp. garlic powder", "2 Tbsp. chili powder", "salt and pepper to taste", "1 Tbsp. prepared mustard", "1 1/2 lb. ground beef", "6 oz. can water", "6 oz. can tomato paste", "4 or 5 wieners, ground"]
Recipe: ["Combine all ingredients in a large pan.", "Simmer until done (thick, about 2 1/2 hours).", "Put on hot dogs with mustard and onions."]

Title: Bean Soup
Ingredients: ["2 c. dry lima beans", "2 slices Oscar Mayer bacon", "1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen whole kernel corn", "1/4 lb. (4 oz.) Louis Rich turkey smoked sausage, thinly sliced", "1 onion, chopped", "1 1/2 Tbsp. flour", "pepper"]
Recipe: ["Place beans in a large saucepan.", "Add enough water to cover; bring to a boil, reduce heat and cook on medium-low for 2 1/2 hours or until tender.", "Cook bacon in large skillet until crispy.", "Place bacon on paper towels, reserving drippings in the skillet to be used later; crumble bacon.", "Add bacon, corn, sausage and onions to beans in saucepan.", "Reduce heat to low; simmer 1 hour.", "Stir flour into reserved bacon drippings in skillet.", "Cook on medium-low heat until bubbly, stirring frequently.", "Gradually stir in 1 1/2 cups water until mixture boils and thickens, stirring frequently.", "Add to soup; simmer 30 minutes.", "Season to taste with pepper.", "Makes 6 (1 1/2 cup) servings."]

Title: Funnel Cake
Ingredients: ["1 1/3 cup flour", "1/4 teaspoon salt", "1/2 teaspoon soda", "2 tablespoons sugar", "1 egg (beaten)", "2/3 cup milk (more if batter is too thick)"]
Recipe: ["Sift together dry ingredients.", "Mix egg and milk together.", "Add dry ingredients, beat until smooth.", "Hold finger over bottom of funnel.", "Pour in some batter.", "Remove finger and let batter drip in a spiral motion in pan filled with 1-inch of hot oil, 375 degrees. Fry until golden brown, turning once.", "Remove from pan and drain on a paper towel.", "Sprinkle with powdered sugar and serve hot."]

Title: Salmon Log
Ingredients: ["1 (1 lb.) can salmon", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 Tbsp. lemon juice", "2 tsp. grated onion", "1 tsp. horseradish (optional)", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. liquid smoke", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "3 Tbsp. chopped parsley"]
Recipe: ["Drain the salmon, removing all the skin and bones.", "Flake the salmon, then combine with the next 6 ingredients.", "Mix thoroughly; chill several hours."]

Title: Red And Yellow Salmon Berry Jam
Ingredients: ["3 qt. salmon berries", "8 1/2 c. sugar", "1 pkg. pectin"]
Recipe: ["Wash and bring 3-quart berries.", "Measure sugar into a dry dish.", "Measure 6 cups of berries into a large kettle.", "Add pectin and stir well.", "Bring to a boil.", "Add measured sugar and mix well. Continue stirring and bring to a full rolling boil.", "Boil exactly 4 minutes and pour into prepared jars."]

Title: Apple Cream Pie
Ingredients: ["1 graham cracker pie crust", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. softened cream cheese", "1/3 c. sugar", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 (8 oz.) container Cool Whip, thawed", "1 can apple pie filling"]

Title: Tropical Punch
Ingredients: ["1 pkg. strawberry Kool-Aid", "1 pkg. orange Kool-Aid", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "3 1/4 qt. water with ice", "1 (16 oz.) can peach soda", "1 (6 oz.) can frozen orange juice", "1 (12 oz.) can pineapple juice", "1 (12 oz.) bottle ginger ale"]
Recipe: ["Dissolve Kool-Aid packages and sugar in water with ice.", "Add soda, the juices and ginger ale.", "Chill and serve."]

Title: Cherry Crumb Cake
Ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "2 tsp. baking powder", "3/4 c. margarine", "1 1/4 c. sugar", "2 eggs, beaten", "3/4 c. milk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 can cherry pie filling"]
Recipe: ["Sift together the flour, salt, sugar and baking powder.", "Mix in margarine as for pie crust.", "Take out one cup of this mixture for topping.", "To remainder, add the eggs, milk and vanilla. Blend well and spread in a greased 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan. Spread fruit filling gently over batter and top with reserved crumbs."]

Title: Cinnamon Apples
Ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1 c. water", "2 Tbsp. red cinnamon drops", "6 medium size firm tart apples", "whole cloves"]
Recipe: ["Combine sugar, water and red cinnamon drops in 1 1/2-quart casserole.", "Cook about 3 minutes in Radarange oven.", "Core and pare apples.", "Stick 3 or 4 cloves into each apple.", "Place apples in the red cinnamon syrup.", "Cook about 7 to 8 minutes or until apples are tender but firm.", "Turn apples every 2 1/2 minutes.", "Cool apples in syrup before serving."]

Title: Salt Risin' Bread(Makes Two 8-Inch Loaves)
Ingredients: ["1 medium potato", "3 Tbsp. cornmeal", "1 tsp. salt", "1 c. milk", "1/4 tsp. baking soda", "1 1/2 c. boiling water", "2 tsp. sugar", "1 pkg. active dry yeast", "5 1/2 to 6 c. plain flour", "1 large egg white (optional)"]
Recipe: ["On the day before you undertake this operation, you must start the starter.", "So peel and finely chop the potato.", "Place in medium bowl and stir in the boiling water, cornmeal, sugar and salt. Cover and set aside overnight at room temperature."]

Title: Aleasha'S Love Cookies
Ingredients: ["1 c. peanut butter", "1 1/4 c. powdered milk", "1 c. light corn syrup", "1 1/4 c. powdered sugar"]
Recipe: ["Mix well.", "Roll into little balls and share with someone you love."]

Title: Nanny-Grammy'S Cream Cheese Pound Cake
Ingredients: ["3/4 c. butter", "2 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "4 eggs", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 3/4 c. all-purpose flour", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "powdered sugar"]
Recipe: ["Bring butter, cream cheese and eggs to room temperature, about 1 hour. Grease and flour 9-inch fluted tube pan. Set aside."]

Title: Apricot Glazed Ham
Ingredients: ["5 lb. smoked boneless ham", "1 lb. dried apricots", "2 c. water", "1/2 c. brown sugar", "1 tsp. allspice"]
Recipe: ["Soak the ham overnight in enough water to cover it. Refrigerate.", "(This removes excess salt.)"]

Title: Yellow Split Pea Soup
Ingredients: ["ham or ham bone", "1 pkg. yellow split peas", "2 large carrots, chopped fine", "1 large onion", "2 sticks celery, chopped fine", "green pepper", "salt and pepper to taste"]
Recipe: ["Place ingredients in a large pot.", "Cover with water (about 6 to 8 cups).", "Cook on low heat several hours, being sure to add water if necessary."]

Title: Buttered Pecans
Ingredients: ["pecans", "butter", "salt"]
Recipe: ["Place pecans in microwave dish.", "Place in center of oven. Cook on medium to high for 3 minutes, stirring once.", "Pour in bowl and add butter.", "Stir.", "Sprinkle with salt."]

Title: Peanut Butter Fudge
Ingredients: ["6 c. sugar", "1 tall can milk", "2 sticks butter or oleo", "1 pt. Marshmallow Creme", "1 (12 oz.) jar peanut butter", "English or black walnuts (optional)"]
Recipe: ["Combine sugar, milk and butter in large pan.", "Put on stove and bring to a boil.", "Boil for 9 minutes.", "Stir at all times.", "Take off stove and add Marshmallow Creme and peanut butter.", "Stir well; add nuts.", "Pour in a large buttered cookie sheet.", "Cut when cool."]

Title: Baked Coon
Ingredients: ["1 raccoon", "salt", "water"]
Recipe: ["The", "raccoon", "which", "makes", "free with the farmer's corn gets very fat in the fall, on the corn, apples and clover and makes delicious", "eating.\tThough often thrown away because of the prejudice that many people have against wild meat.\tFirst skin the", "coon carefully, then remove the layer of fat, which is", "often an", "inch", "thick and right under the skin.\tThis fat would\tgive the", "meat a disagreeable, oily taste, if left on. But it is nice and white and can be tried out the same as leaf lard, and used for soap."]

Title: Fettucini
Ingredients: ["8 oz. uncooked egg noodles", "1/2 c. whipping cream or milk", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. snipped parsley", "1/2 c. butter/margarine", "3/4 c. grated fresh Parmesan cheese", "dash of pepper"]
Recipe: ["Cook noodles as", "directed.", "Drain.", "Heat", "margarine and cream over low heat.", "Stir", "in", "cheese, salt and pepper.", "Pour sauce over hot noodles.", "Toss to coat.", "Sprinkle with parsley. Great with scallops or shrimp added."]

Title: Springtime Punch
Ingredients: ["2 cans Hawaiian Punch", "2 large bottles ginger ale", "ice", "1 qt. raspberry, lime or strawberry sherbet", "champagne (optional)"]
Recipe: ["Pour Hawaiian Punch into a punch bowl.", "Add sherbet.", "Pour ginger ale over the sherbet.", "Add ice and champagne, if desired."]

Title: Strawberry Freezer Jam
Ingredients: ["3 c. crushed strawberries", "6 c. sugar", "2 Tbsp. lemon juice", "2 pkg. Certo"]
Recipe: ["Stir crushed strawberries and sugar until sugar is dissolved. Let stand 15 minutes.", "Re-stir.", "Add Certo.", "Put into pint containers.", "Refrigerate 24 hours.", "Freeze."]

Title: Super Quick Salad
Ingredients: ["1 carton creamed cottage cheese", "1 small carton whipped topping", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. Jell-O", "fruit, drained"]
Recipe: ["Mix cottage cheese with dry Jell-O.", "Add whipped topping and your favorite fruit.", "Good combinations are orange Jell-O with mandarin oranges, peaches or pineapple and strawberry Jell-O with fruit cocktail."]

Title: Pineapple Fluff
Ingredients: ["2 boxes Dream Whip", "2 c. powdered sugar", "2 eggs", "1/3 c. soft butter", "1 can crushed pineapple, well drained", "1/2 c. nut meats", "graham cracker crumbs"]
Recipe: ["Mix the Dream Whip as usual; beat until fluffy.", "Cream together the powdered sugar, eggs and soft butter.", "Fold the pineapple and nut meats in gently with first mixture.", "Grease the dish; sprinkle with graham cracker crumbs, top and bottom. Refrigerate; ready to eat."]

Title: Lobster Tails On The Grill
Ingredients: ["1 stick butter", "2 lobster tails (6 oz. and up), defrosted", "oil for greasing grill"]
Recipe: ["Cut bottom of lobster to the shell, but not all the way through.", "Cut all membrane from under lobster and discard.", "Break shell so lobster can butterfly, but not completely in half.", "Brush lobster with butter and place on grill, meat side down, for 2 to 3 minutes.", "Turn lobster over; brush again with butter and season with garlic salt or preferred seasonings.", "Cook 7 to 10 minutes, shell side down, or until done, depending on size and heat of grill.", "Lobster is cooked when meat turns opaque."]

Title: French Toast
Ingredients: ["3 eggs", "1 tsp. granulated sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "3/4 c. milk", "8 to 10 slices stale bread", "icing sugar for sprinkling"]
Recipe: ["In a mixing bowl, put eggs, sugar, salt and milk.", "Mix together thoroughly.", "Dip bread slices in batter.", "Fry on lightly greased medium hot pan.", "Brown on both sides.", "Serve sprinkled with icing sugar and fresh strawberries for a special treat."]

Title: Carrot Salad
Ingredients: ["2 bunches carrots, cut diagonally into 1-inch pieces and cooked", "1/2 c. salad oil", "1/2 c. cider vinegar", "1/2 c. plus 2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 can tomato soup (undiluted)", "1 large onion, chopped", "1 green pepper, chopped"]
Recipe: ["Mix sauce; pour it over carrots while hot.", "Serve cold."]

Title: Beignets And Doughnuts
Ingredients: ["1 c. boiling water", "1/4 c. Crisco", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "1 c. evaporated milk", "1 pkg. yeast in 1/2 c. lukewarm water", "2 eggs, beaten", "7 1/2 c. all-purpose flour (approximately)"]
Recipe: ["Pour hot water over Crisco and sugar.", "Stir and cool to lukewarm.", "Dissolve yeast in 1/2 cup lukewarm water and stir in cooled mixture.", "Add beaten eggs and milk.", "Stir in 4 cups of flour and beat.", "Add enough flour to make a stiff dough.", "Place in large bowl that has been oiled.", "Brush with melted Crisco.", "Cover with damp cloth and chill.", "When ready to use, knead lightly with flour and then roll to 1/4-inch and cut in diamond shapes. Fry in hot oil about 3-inches deep.", "Drain on towel.", "Then shake in bag with powdered sugar.", "This also makes good rolls and keeps well in refrigerator for several days."]

Title: Sweet And Sour Smoked Sausage
Ingredients: ["2 lb. Eckrich smoked sausage, cut in small pieces", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1/2 c. warm water", "4 heaping Tbsp. brown sugar", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 tsp. mustard"]
Recipe: ["Place sausage pieces in crock-pot.", "Mix all other ingredients and pour over sausage.", "Start crock-pot on high, turn back to low for 4 to 6 hours."]

Title: Potato Salad
Ingredients: ["6 medium potatoes, cooked and diced", "6 hard-boiled eggs, peeled and diced", "2 medium onions, grated", "1/2 c. diced sweet pickles", "1 c. Hellmann's mayonnaise", "1/4 c. olives", "1/4 c. sweet peppers", "2 tsp. sugar", "salt and pepper to taste", "1 Tbsp. prepared mustard", "1 Tbsp. vinegar"]
Recipe: ["Combine first five ingredients.", "Mix remaining ingredients. Stir well, until smooth.", "Pour over first set of ingredients and stir lightly until mixed well.", "Garnish with hard-cooked eggs."]

Title: Crock-Pot Beef Stew
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 to 2 lb. stew beef", "1 pkg. onion soup mix", "1/2 stalk celery", "4 carrots, cut up", "5 to 6 medium size potatoes, cut and cubed", "1/2 c. flour", "salt and pepper to taste"]
Recipe: ["In a crock-pot, put stew beef, potatoes, carrots and celery. Stir.", "Also add remaining ingredients.", "Stir occasionally until all beef is cooked through and potatoes and carrots are easy to cut.", "Start crock-pot early in morning to give stew beef plenty of time to cook."]

Title: Mornay Sauce
Ingredients: ["3 Tbsp. margarine", "3 Tbsp. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 dash cayenne pepper", "1 1/2 c. milk", "1/4 c. Parmesan cheese"]
Recipe: ["Melt margarine.", "Stir in flour, salt and cayenne.", "Cook for", "1 minute.", "Remove.", "Stir in milk until mixture is smooth. Cook over low heat, stirring until thick.", "Add cheese."]

Title: Potato Soup
Ingredients: ["10 medium potatoes, cut in small cubes", "1 can evaporated milk", "3 Tbsp. butter", "salt", "8 slices cooked bacon", "1/2 c. onion, diced"]
Recipe: ["In large soup pan saute bacon, onion and celery until tender. Add cubed potatoes; cover with water and boil until potatoes are tender.", "Drain water until it covers potatoes.", "Add can of evaporated milk and butter.", "Mash potatoes and warm soup.", "Serve hot."]

Title: Never Fail Pie Crust
Ingredients: ["3 c. flour", "5 Tbsp. ice water", "1 egg, well beaten", "1 tsp. salt", "1 1/4 c. shortening", "1 Tbsp. vinegar"]
Recipe: ["Combine flour and salt.", "Work in shortening.", "Add vinegar and egg.", "Add ice water."]

Title: Easy Carrot Salad
Ingredients: ["1 c. carrots, shredded fine", "1 c. Granny Smith apples, chopped", "1 c. raisins", "1/2 c. salad dressing", "1/2 c. orange juice"]
Recipe: ["Mix carrots, apples and raisins.", "Mix salad dressing and orange juice together and pour over other ingredients.", "Makes 6 servings."]

Title: Fruit Salad
Ingredients: ["6 apples", "6 oranges", "4 to 6 bananas", "1 to 2 lb. seedless grapes", "1 box vanilla pudding", "1 (6 oz.) can frozen orange juice"]
Recipe: ["Peel and cut up apples, oranges and bananas.", "Add orange juice and pudding; mix well and chill."]

Title: Chicken Supreme
Ingredients: ["2 c. cooked chicken or turkey", "1 pkg. frozen string beans", "1/4 can slivered blanched almonds", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "1/2 c. milk or juice from beans", "2 c. prepared package stuffing", "2 Tbsp. butter, melted", "1/4 c. hot water", "4 oz. Swiss cheese (optional)"]
Recipe: ["Cook and drain beans.", "In buttered shallow baking dish, distribute 2/3 cup of package stuffing crumbs.", "Arrange beans in layer over crumbs, then scatter almonds."]
